glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。此步骤是终结阶段的第二个也是最后一个步骤。参见规则514，“清除步骤”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows you to pay an alternative cost to remove some of a spell’s text. See rule 702.148, “Cleave.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许你支付替代性费用来删去咒语的部分规则叙述。参见规则702.148，“贯通”。

glossary.en: A keyword action that puts a card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. See rule 701.56, “Cloak,” and rule 708, “Face-Down Spells and Permanents.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，将牌以牌面朝下的方式作为2/2、具守护{2}的生物放进战场。参见规则701.56，“匿伏”，和规则708，“牌面朝下的咒语和永久物”。

glossary.en: A Clue token is a colorless artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.” For more information about predefined tokens, see rule 111.10.
glossary.zh: 线索衍生物是具有“{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌。”的无色衍生神器。欲知关于预定义衍生物的更多信息，参见规则111.10。

glossary.en: A keyword action. To “collect evidence N” means to exile any number of cards from your graveyard with total mana value N or greater. See rule 701.57, “Collect Evidence.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作。“搜证N”意指，从你的坟墓场放逐任意数量的牌，且其法术力值加总须达到N或更多。参见规则701.57，“搜证”。

glossary.en: A number printed on most cards that has no effect on game play. See rule 213, “Information Below the Text Box.”
glossary.zh: 印在绝大多数牌上对游戏没有影响的编号。参见规则213，“文字栏下方信息”。

glossary.en:
1. A characteristic of an object. See rule 105, “Colors,” and rule 202, “Mana Cost and Color.”
2. An attribute mana may have. See rule 106, “Mana.”
glossary.zh:
1. 物件的一个特征。参见规则105，“颜色”，以及规则202，“法术力费用和颜色”。
2. 一个法术力可能具有的特征。参见规则106，“法术力”。

glossary.en:
1. An object with no color is colorless. Colorless is not a color. See rule 105, “Colors,” and rule 202, “Mana Cost and Color.”
2. A type of mana. See rule 106, “Mana,” and rule 107.4c.
glossary.zh:
1. 一个没有颜色的物件为无色。无色不是颜色。参见规则105，“颜色”，以及规则202，“法术力费用和颜色”。
2. 一种法术力。参见规则106，“法术力”，以及规则107.4c。

glossary.en: A set of colors that determines what cards may be included in a deck for the Commander casual variant. See rule 903.4.
glossary.zh: 一系列颜色，在指挥官休闲玩法中决定哪些牌可以加入套牌。参见规则903.4。

glossary.en: A characteristic of an object. See rule 105, “Colors,” and rule 204, “Color Indicator.”
glossary.zh: 物件的一个特征。参见规则105，“颜色”，以及规则204，“颜色标志”。

glossary.en: Damage dealt during the combat damage step by attacking creatures and blocking creatures as a consequence of combat. See rule 510, “Combat Damage Step.”
glossary.zh: 在战斗伤害步骤中由攻击生物和阻挡生物作为战斗结果所造成的伤害。参见规则510，“战斗伤害步骤”。

glossary.en: Part of the turn. This step is the fourth step of the combat phase. See rule 510, “Combat Damage Step.”
glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。此步骤是战斗阶段的第四个步骤。参见规则510，“战斗伤害步骤”。

glossary.en: Part of the turn. This phase is the third phase of the turn. See rule 506, “Combat Phase.”
glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。此阶段是回合的第三个阶段。参见规则506，“战斗阶段”。

glossary.en: A zone for certain specialized objects that have an overarching effect on the game, yet are not permanents and cannot be destroyed. See rule 408, “Command.”
glossary.zh: 一些对游戏有总体影响且当前不是永久物也不能被消灭的特殊物件所在的区域。参见规则408，“统帅区”。

glossary.en:
1. A casual variant in which each deck is led by a legendary creature. See rule 903, “Commander.”
2. A designation given to one legendary creature card in each player’s deck in the Commander casual variant.
glossary.zh:
1. 一种休闲式玩法，套牌由一个传奇生物来领导。参见规则903，“指挥官”。
2. 在指挥官休闲式玩法中，给予每位牌手的套牌中一张传奇生物牌的称号。

glossary.en: A casual variant in which players participate in a booster draft and then play multiplayer games. See rule 903.13, “Commander Draft.”
glossary.zh: 一种休闲玩法，牌手参加补充包轮抽，然后进行多人游戏。参见规则903.13，“指挥官轮抽”。

glossary.en: A variant of the ninjutsu ability. See rule 702.49, “Ninjutsu.”
glossary.zh: 忍术异能的一种变化。参见规则702.49，“忍术”。

glossary.en: Informal term for the additional cost to cast a commander based on the number of times a player has cast it previously this game. See rule 903.8.
glossary.zh: 一个非正式用词，意指施放指挥官的额外费用，此费用会根据牌手于这盘游戏先前的时段中施放过指挥官的次数决定。参见规则903.8。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows a player to choose one creature card from outside the game as a companion if the restriction of that card’s companion ability is met. Once a player has chosen a companion, that player may pay {3} to put it into their hand once during the game. See rule 702.139, “Companion.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许牌手从游戏外选择一张生物牌作为行侣（如果能满足该牌的行侣异能限制的话）。一旦牌手选定行侣，该牌手可以在游戏中支付一次{3}，将其置于手上。参见规则702.139，“行侣”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that causes a planeswalker to enter the battlefield with fewer loyalty counters if a player chose to pay life for Phyrexian mana symbols in its cost. See rule 702.150, “Compleated.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，若牌手施放鹏洛客时选择为其费用中的非瑞克西亚法术力符号支付生命，则使其进战场时带有较少的忠诚指示物。参见规则702.150，“完化”。

glossary.en: To remove a dungeon card from the game after reaching that dungeon card’s bottommost room. See rule 309, “Dungeons.”
glossary.zh: 在达到地城牌的最底下的房间之后，将该地城牌移出游戏。参见规则309，“地城”。

glossary.en: To quit the game. Conceding a game immediately causes that player to leave that game and lose that game. See rule 104, “Ending the Game.”
glossary.zh: 离开游戏。认输游戏让牌手立刻离开游戏并输去游戏。参见规则104，“结束游戏”。

glossary.en: A keyword action that causes a player to draw a card, discard a card, and then to put a +1/+1 counter on a creature if a nonland card was discarded this way. See rule 701.47, “Connive.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，使牌手抓一张牌，弃一张牌，然后如果以此法弃掉一张非地牌，在一个生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。参见规则701.47，“筹谋”。

glossary.en: A card type used in Limited formats such as Conspiracy Draft. A conspiracy card is not a permanent. See rule 315, “Conspiracies.”
glossary.zh: 一种在限制赛，例如诡局轮抽中使用的牌类别。诡局牌不是永久物。参见规则315，“诡局”。

glossary.en: A casual variant in which players participate in a booster draft and then play multiplayer games. See rule 905, “Conspiracy Draft.”
glossary.zh: 一种休闲玩法，牌手参加补充包轮抽，然后进行多人游戏。参见规则905，“诡局轮抽”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that creates a copy of a spell. See rule 702.78, “Conspire.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物可以复制咒语。参见规则702.78，“协力”。

glossary.en: A way of playing in which each player creates their own deck ahead of time. See rule 100.2a.
glossary.zh: 牌手在赛前自己创造套牌的游戏方式。参见规则100.2a。

glossary.en: An effect that modifies characteristics of objects, modifies control of objects, or affects players or the rules of the game, for a fixed or indefinite period. See rule 611, “Continuous Effects.”
glossary.zh: 影响物件特征、物件操控权、或影响牌手或游戏规则的效应，具有固定时限或一直有效。参见规则611，“持续性效应”。

glossary.en: An obsolete term that appeared on the type line of artifacts without activated abilities. Cards printed with this text have received errata in the Oracle card reference to simply say “Artifact.”
glossary.zh: 一个已废止的用语，出现在不具有起动式异能的神器类别栏。印有此叙述的牌已经在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误，改为只是“神器”。

glossary.en: “Control” is the system that determines who gets to use an object in the game. An object’s “controller” is the player who currently controls it. See rule 108.4.
glossary.zh: “操控”是一个系统，决定谁在游戏中可以用一个物件。一个物件的“操控者”是当前操控它的牌手。参见规则108.4。

glossary.en: To make all choices and decisions that player is allowed to make, or is told to make, by rules or by any objects. See rule 720, “Controlling Another Player.”
glossary.zh: 为在该牌手作出由规则或物件允许或要求的所有选择和决定。参见规则720，“操控其他牌手”。

glossary.en: To turn a double-faced card so its other face is up. See rule 701.50, “Convert.”
glossary.zh: 将一张双面牌翻转从而让其另一面朝上。参见规则701.50，“转换”。

glossary.en: An obsolete term for mana value. Cards printed with this term have received errata in the Oracle card reference.
glossary.zh: 法术力值的已废止用词。印有此叙述的牌已经在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets you tap creatures rather than pay mana to cast a spell. See rule 702.51, “Convoke.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让你横置生物来施放咒语而不是支付法术力。参见规则702.51，“召集”。

glossary.en: Values of an object’s characteristics that are checked by copy effects. See rules 613.2, 707.2, and 707.3.
glossary.zh: 物件由复制效应所检查的特征值。参见规则613.2、707.2以及707.3。

glossary.en:
1. To create a new object whose copiable values have been set to those of another object.
2. An object whose copiable values have been set to those of another object.
See rule 707, “Copying Objects.”
glossary.zh:
1. 创造一个新的物件，其可复制特征值设为与另一个物件相同。
2. 一个物件的可复制特征值设为与另一个物件相同。
参见规则707，“复制物件”。

glossary.en: An action or payment necessary to take another action or to stop another action from taking place. See rule 118, “Costs.”
glossary.zh: 一个动作或为另一个动作所支付必须的费用或阻止另一个动作发生。参见规则118，“费用”。

glossary.zhname: 反击/指示物（译者注：在英文中这两个词是相同的。）
glossary.en:
1. To cancel a spell or ability so it doesn’t resolve and none of its effects occur. See rule 701.5, “Counter.”
2. A marker placed on an object or player that modifies its characteristics or interacts with a rule or ability. See rule 122, “Counters.”
glossary.zh:
1. 取消一个咒语或异能，让它不能结算且它的效应都不发生。参见规则701.5，“反击”。
2. 一个放置在物件或牌手上的标示物，影响其特征或与规则或异能互动。参见规则122，“指示物”。

glossary.en: Some older cards were printed with text stating that the card “counts as” something. Cards printed with this text have received errata in the Oracle card reference to state that the card actually is that thing.
glossary.zh: 一些老牌印有叙述该牌“视为”其他东西。印有此叙述的牌已经在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误，它们现在正式为该东西。

glossary.en: Craft is an activated ability that allows a player to exile cards from their graveyard and/or permanents they control to exile the permanent with the craft ability and return it onto the battlefield transformed. See rule 702.167, “Craft.”
glossary.zh: 化炼是起动式异能，允许牌手从坟墓场和/或战场上放逐牌，以放逐具化炼异能的永久物并将其移回战场且已转化。参见规则702.167，“化炼”。

glossary.en: To create a token is to put a token onto the battlefield. See rule 701.6, “Create.”
glossary.zh: 派出一个衍生物指，将一个衍生物放进战场。参见规则701.6，“派出”。

glossary.en: A card type. A creature is a permanent. See rule 302, “Creatures.”
glossary.zh: 一个牌类别。生物是永久物。参见规则302，“生物”。

glossary.en: A subtype that’s correlated to the creature card type and the kindred card type. See rule 302, “Creatures,” and rule 308, “Kindreds.” See rule 205.3m for the list of creature types.
glossary.zh: 一个副类别，对应生物牌类别和亲缘牌类别。参见规则302，“生物”，以及规则308，“亲缘”。生物类别的列表参见规则205.3m。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets you tap creatures to turn a Vehicle into an artifact creature. See rule 301, “Artifacts,” and rule 702.122, “Crew.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使你可以横置生物将一个载具变成神器生物。参见规则301，“神器”，及规则702.122，“搭载”。

glossary.en: Targeting an opponent, anything that opponent controls, and/or any cards in an opponent’s graveyard is a crime. See rule 700.13.
glossary.zh: 将对手，任何由其操控的东西和／或其坟墓场中的牌指定为目标，即属罪行。参见规则700.13。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that imposes an increasing cost to keep a permanent on the battlefield. See rule 702.24, “Cumulative Upkeep.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，为保留永久物在战场上规定了一个不断提升的费用。参见规则702.24，“累积维持”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a card be discarded and replaced with a new card. See rule 702.29, “Cycling.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌可以被弃掉并用新牌代替。参见规则702.29，“循环”。

glossary.en: Objects can deal “damage” to creatures, planeswalkers, and players. This is generally detrimental to the object or player that receives that damage. See rule 120, “Damage.”
glossary.zh: 物件可以对生物、鹏洛客、以及牌手造成“伤害”。一般情况下这对受到伤害的物件或牌手来说是不利的。参见规则120，“伤害”。

glossary.en: The order, announced during the declare blockers step, that an attacking creature will assign its combat damage among the multiple creatures blocking it, or that a blocking creature will assign its combat damage among the multiple creatures it’s blocking. See rules 509.2 and 509.3.
glossary.zh: 在宣告阻挡者步骤中，对攻击生物对多个阻挡它的生物分配战斗伤害的顺序，或阻挡生物对其阻挡的多个生物分配战斗伤害的顺序。参见规则509.2以及509.3。

glossary.en: A keyword ability found on creature cards that allows them to be cast for an alternative cost. See rule 702.109, “Dash.”
glossary.zh: 一个见于生物牌上的关键字异能，允许其使用替代性费用来施放。参见规则702.109，“掩袭”。

glossary.en: Along with night, a designation the game can have. See rule 727, “Day and Night,” and rule 702.145, “Daybound and Nightbound.”
glossary.zh: 与黑夜一起，均是游戏可以具有的称号。参见规则728，“白昼与黑夜”，与规则702.145，“昼形与夜形”。

glossary.en: An ability found on the front faces of some double-faced cards. Cards with daybound and nightbound are face up when it’s day and face down when it’s night. See rule 702.145, “Daybound and Nightbound,” and rule 727, “Day and Night.”
glossary.zh: 一种异能，见于一些双面牌的正面上。具昼形与夜形异能的牌，在白昼时正面朝上，在黑夜时背面朝上。参见规则702.145，“昼形与夜形”，与规则728，“白昼与黑夜”。

glossary.en: See Damage.
glossary.zh: 参见伤害。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that causes damage dealt by an object to be especially effective. See rule 702.2, “Deathtouch.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让物件造成的伤害特别有效。参见规则702.2，“死触”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that means “This creature can’t block” and “When this creature attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat. See rule 702.147, “Decayed.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，意指“此生物不能进行阻挡”和“当此生物攻击时，在战斗结束时将它牺牲。”参见规则702.147，“败朽”。

glossary.en: The collection of cards a player starts the game with; it becomes that player’s library. See rule 100, “General,” and rule 103, “Starting the Game.”
glossary.zh: 牌手开始游戏时所使用牌的集合；它将成为该牌手的牌库。参见规则100，“总则”，以及规则103，“开始游戏”。

glossary.en: To choose a set of creatures that will attack, declare whether each creature is attacking the defending player or a planeswalker that player controls, and pay any costs required to allow those creatures to attack. See rule 508.1.
glossary.zh: 选择将进行攻击的一组生物，宣告每个生物攻击防御牌手或该牌手操控的一个鹏洛客，并且支付允许这些生物攻击所要求的任何费用。参见规则508.1。

glossary.en: Part of the turn. This step is the second step of the combat phase. See rule 508, “Declare Attackers Step.”
glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。该步骤是战斗阶段的第二个步骤。参见规则508，“宣告攻击者步骤”。

glossary.en: To choose a set of creatures that will block, declare which attacking creature each creature is blocking, and pay any costs required to allow those creatures to block. See rule 509.1.
glossary.zh: 选择将进行阻挡的一组生物，为每个生物宣告将阻挡那个攻击生物，并支付允许这些生物阻挡所要求的任何费用。参见规则509.1。

glossary.en: Part of the turn. This step is the third step of the combat phase. See rule 509, “Declare Blockers Step.”
glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。该步骤是战斗阶段的第三个步骤。参见规则509，“宣告阻挡者步骤”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that prohibits a creature from attacking. See rule 702.3, “Defender.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让某个生物不能进行攻击。参见规则702.3，“守军”。

glossary.en: The player who can be attacked, and whose planeswalkers can be attacked, during the combat phase. See rule 506.2. In certain multiplayer games, there may be more than one defending player; see rule 802, “Attack Multiple Players Option,” and rule 805.10.
glossary.zh: 在战斗阶段中，可以被攻击的牌手，且其鹏洛客可以被攻击。参见规则506.2。在某些多人玩法中，可能会有多于一个防御牌手；参见规则802，“攻击复数牌手模式”，以及规则805.10。

glossary.en: The team who can be attacked, and whose planeswalkers can be attacked, during the combat phase of a multiplayer game using the shared team turns option. See rule 805, “Shared Team Turns Option.”
glossary.zh: 在使用队伍共享回合模式的多人游戏的战斗阶段中，可以被攻击、且其鹏洛客可以被攻击的队伍。参见规则805，“队伍共享回合模式”。

glossary.en:
1. Part of a card that only battle cards have. A battle card’s defense is printed in its lower right corner. See rule 210, “Defense.”
2. A characteristic that only battles can have. See rule 310, “Battles.”
glossary.zh:
1. 只有战役牌具有的牌的一部分。战役的布防印在其右下角。参见规则210，“布防”。
2. 只有战役具有的特征。参见规则310，“战役”。

glossary.en: An ability created by effects generated when some spells or abilities resolve, or when some replacement effects are applied, that does something later on rather than at that time. See rule 603.7.
glossary.zh: 当一些咒语或异能结算时所创造的效应所创造的异能，或当一些替代性效应生效时，不是在当时而是在之后作某些事情。参见规则603.7。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets you exile cards from your graveyard rather than pay generic mana to cast a spell. See rule 702.66, “Delve.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让你从你的坟墓场中放逐牌来施放咒语，而不是支付一般法术力。参见规则702.66，“掘穴”。

glossary.en: A triggered ability found on some spells that let its controller copy it and choose an opponent to also copy it. See rule 702.144, “Demonstrate.”
glossary.zh: 一些咒语上的触发式异能，使其操控者复制之，并选择一个对手亦复制之。参见规则702.144，“示范”。

glossary.en: A system that may be used to determine in which order continuous effects in the same layer or sublayer are applied. See rule 613.8. See also Timestamp Order.
glossary.zh: 一个对决定在同一层或副层中，持续性效应生效顺序所使用的系统。参见规则613.8。另参见时间印记顺序。

glossary.en: An option that may be used in certain multiplayer variants to pass control of creatures between teammates. See rule 804, “Deploy Creatures Option.”
glossary.zh: 一些多人玩法中可以采用的一种模式，队友之间可以互相给予生物的操控权。参见规则804，“调动生物模式”。

glossary.en: To move a permanent from the battlefield to its owner’s graveyard. See rule 701.7, “Destroy.”
glossary.zh: 将一个永久物从战场移动到其拥有者的坟墓场。参见规则701.7，“消灭”。

glossary.en: A keyword action that temporarily stops a permanent from attacking, blocking, or having its activated abilities activated. See rule 701.29, “Detain.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，临时阻止一个永久物攻击、阻挡，或起动其具有的起动式异能。参见规则701.29，“拘留”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that puts a +1/+1 counter on a creature when it attacks the player with the most life. See rule 702.105, “Dethrone.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，具有该异能的生物在攻击生命值最多的牌手时，会在生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。参见规则702.105，“义勇”。

glossary.en: A characteristic-defining ability that makes an object colorless. See rule 702.114, “Devoid.”
glossary.zh: 一个特征定义异能，使物件成为无色。参见规则702.114，“虚色”。

glossary.en: A numerical value a player has, equal to the number of mana symbols of a certain color among the mana costs of permanents that player controls. See rule 700.5.
glossary.zh: 一个牌手具有的数字，等同于该牌手操控的永久物之法术力费用中，某种特别颜色的法术力符号数量。参见规则700.5。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that can have a creature enter the battlefield with +1/+1 counters on it. See rule 702.82, “Devour.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，可以让生物进入战场带有+1/+1指示物。参见规则702.82，“吞噬”。

glossary.en: A creature or planeswalker “dies” if it is put into a graveyard from the battlefield. See rule 700.4.
glossary.zh: 如果一个生物或鹏洛客从战场进入坟墓场，该生物或鹏洛客“死去”。参见规则700.4。

glossary.en: To move a card from its owner’s hand to that player’s graveyard. See rule 701.8, “Discard.”
glossary.zh: 从拥有者的手上将牌移入该牌手的坟墓场。参见规则701.8，“弃牌”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that may allow a player to cast a random spell for free. See rule 701.55, “Discover.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许牌手不付费用施放一个随机咒语。参见规则701.55，“倾探”。（译注：我确信这是一个关键字动作。）

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a card be cast face down as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. See rule 702.168, “Disguise,” and rule 708, “Face-Down Spells and Permanents.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许该牌以牌面朝下的方式，且视为2/2、具守护{2}的生物一般施放。参见规则702.168，“伪装”，和规则708，“牌面朝下的咒语和永久物”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows a player to cast a double-faced card transformed from the graveyard. See rule 702.146, “Disturb.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许牌手从坟墓场以已转化的方式施放双面牌。参见规则702.146，“惊扰”。

glossary.en: A partner ability that allows a player to play with two legendary creature cards as their commander if one of them has Doctor’s companion and the other is a Time Lord Doctor with no other creature types.
glossary.zh: 拍档异能的一种变化形式。在指挥官玩法中，如果两张传奇永久物牌其中之一具有“博士伙伴”异能，另一张是时间领主／医生且不具其他生物类别，则可将这两个传奇永久物用作你的指挥官，而非只使用一个。参见规则702.124，“拍档”，和规则903，“指挥官”。

glossary.en: A variant of the hidden agenda ability. See rule 702.106, “Hidden Agenda.”
glossary.zh: 秘案异能的一种变化。参见规则702.106，“秘案”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a creature deal its combat damage twice. See rule 702.4, “Double Strike.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物造成两次战斗伤害。参见规则702.4，“连击”。

glossary.en: Cards with two faces, one on each side of the card, and no Magic card back. See rule 712, “Double-Faced Cards.”
glossary.zh: 两面都具有牌面的牌，并且没有万智牌牌背。参见规则712，“双面牌”。

glossary.zhname: 轮抽/抽选（译者注：在英文中这两个词是相同的。）
glossary.en:
1. A Limited format in which players choose cards one at a time from booster packs, then construct a deck solely from the chosen cards and basic land cards.
2. To choose a card during a draft and put it into your card pool.
glossary.zh:
1. 一种限制赛，牌手依次从补充包中抽选牌，然后只使用所抽选的牌和基本地牌来构组套牌。
2. 在轮抽过程中选择一张牌来加入你的牌池。

glossary.en: Part of a draft in which each player opens an unopened booster pack and the cards in those booster packs are drafted. See rules 905.1a and 905.1b.
glossary.zh: 轮抽过程的一部分，在此过程中每位牌手打开一个未打开的补充包，然后牌手们抽选这些牌。参见规则905.1a和905.1b。

glossary.zhname: 抓/平手（译者注：在英文中这两个词是相同的。）
glossary.en:
1. To put the top card of a player’s library into their hand as a turn-based action or as the result of an effect that uses the word “draw.” See rule 121, “Drawing a Card.”
2. The result of a game in which neither player wins or loses. See rule 104.4.
glossary.zh:
1. 作为回合动作或一个效应的结果，将牌手的牌库顶牌放进其手上，使用“抓”一词。参见规则121，“抓牌”。
2. 没有牌手输或赢的游戏结局。参见规则104.4。

glossary.en: Part of the turn. This step is the third and final step of the beginning phase. See rule 504, “Draw Step.”
glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。该步骤是开始阶段的第三个也是最后一个步骤。参见规则504，“抓牌步骤”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player return a card from their graveyard to their hand. See rule 702.52, “Dredge.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手将牌从其坟墓场中移回其手上。参见规则702.52，“发掘”。

glossary.en: A card type found on nontraditional Magic cards. A dungeon card is not a permanent. See rule 309, “Dungeons.”
glossary.zh: 一种在非传统万智牌牌张上出现的牌类别。地城牌不是永久物。参见规则309，“地城”。

glossary.en: Some older cards used the phrase “during [phase], [action].” These abilities were called “phase abilities.” In general, cards that were printed with phase abilities have received errata in the Oracle card reference so they have abilities that trigger at the beginning of a step or phase. “During” still appears in current card text, but only in its normal English sense and not as game terminology.
glossary.zh: 一些老牌使用“于[阶段]之中，[动作]”。这些异能曾经被称为“阶段异能”。一般情况下，印有阶段异能的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误，它们的异能现在于步骤或阶段开始时触发。“于...之中”依然在当前卡牌的叙述中出现，但只是作为一般语言理解而不是游戏用语。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that imposes a cost to keep a permanent on the battlefield. See rule 702.30, “Echo.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，要求支付一个费用让永久物保留在战场上。参见规则702.30，“返响”。

glossary.en: An older name for the Commander casual variant. See rule 903, “Commander.”
glossary.zh: 指挥官玩法的旧名称。参见规则903，“指挥官”。

glossary.en: Something that happens in the game as a result of a spell or ability. See rule 609, “Effects.”
glossary.zh: 作为咒语或异能的结论在游戏中发生。参见规则609，“效应”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player exile a creature card from their graveyard to create a mummified token version of that card. See rule 702.128, “Embalm.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使牌手从其坟墓场中放逐一张生物牌，来派出该牌化身为木乃伊的衍生物版本。参见规则702.128，“遗存”。

glossary.en: An emblem is a marker used to represent an object that has one or more abilities, but no other characteristics. See rule 114, “Emblems.”
glossary.zh: 徽记是一个标记，用来表示具有一个或数个异能的物件，但是没有其他特征。参见规则114，“徽记”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player cast a spell for less by sacrificing a creature. See rule 702.119, “Emerge.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使得牌手可以牺牲一个生物来减费施放咒语。参见规则702.119，“化生”。

glossary.en: The middle player on each team in an Emperor game. See rule 809, “Emperor Variant.”
glossary.zh: 皇帝游戏中一个队伍坐在中间的牌手。参见规则809，“皇帝玩法”。

glossary.en: A multiplayer variant played among three-player teams. See rule 809, “Emperor Variant.”
glossary.zh: 一个多人玩法，在三人队伍间进行。参见规则809，“皇帝玩法”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that defines what an Aura spell can target and what an Aura permanent can be attached to. See rule 303, “Enchantments,” and rule 702.5, “Enchant.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，定义灵气咒语可以指定的目标以及一个灵气永久物可以贴附的对象。参见规则303，“结界”以及规则702.5，“结附”。

glossary.en: A card type. An enchantment is a permanent. See rule 303, “Enchantments.” See also Aura.
glossary.zh: 一个牌类别。结界是永久物。参见规则303，“结界”。另参见灵气。

glossary.en: A subtype that’s correlated to the enchantment card type. See rule 303, “Enchantments.” See rule 205.3h for the list of enchantment types.
glossary.zh: 与结界牌类别对应的副类别。参见规则303，“结界”。参见规则205.3h的结界类别列表。

glossary.en: A term that describes the relationship between a permanent and a card exiled by a cipher ability. See rule 702.99, “Cipher.”
glossary.zh: 一个用于描述永久物和被暗码异能放逐的牌之间联系的用词。参见规则702.99，“暗码”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player exile a creature card from their graveyard to, for each opponent, create a token that’s a copy of that card to attack that opponent. See rule 702.141, “Encore”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使牌手从其坟墓场放逐一张生物牌，然后每有一位对手，便派出一个该牌的复制品衍生物来攻击该对手。参见规则702.141，“返场”。

glossary.en: To move a phenomenon card off the top of a planar deck and turn it face up. See rule 312, “Phenomena.”
glossary.zh: 将一张异象牌从时空套牌顶移离并翻回正面。参见规则312，“异象”。

glossary.en: Part of the turn. This step is the fifth and final step of the combat phase. See rule 511, “End of Combat Step.”
glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。此步骤是战斗阶段的第五个步骤也是最后一个步骤。参见规则511，“战斗结束步骤”。

glossary.en: Part of the turn. This step is the first step of the ending phase. See rule 513, “End Step.”
glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。此步骤是终结阶段的第一个步骤。参见规则513，“结束步骤”。

glossary.en: To “end the combat phase” as the result of an effect is to perform an expedited process that skips everything else that would happen that phase. See rule 721, “Ending Turns and Phases.”
glossary.zh: 作为一个效应的结果来“结束战斗阶段”指，进行一个快速的流程来略过该阶段将发生的所有其他事情。参见规则721，“结束回合和阶段”。

glossary.en: To “end the turn” as the result of an effect is to perform an expedited process that skips nearly everything else that would happen that turn. See rule 721, “Ending Turns and Phases.”
glossary.zh: 作为一个效应的结果来“结束回合”指，进行一个快速的流程来略过该回合将发生的所有其他事情。参见规则721，“结束回合和阶段”。

glossary.en: Part of the turn. This phase is the fifth and final phase of the turn. See rule 512, “Ending Phase.”
glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。此阶段是回合的第五个也是最后一个阶段。参见规则512，“终结阶段”。

glossary.en: The energy symbol {E} represents one energy counter. To pay {E}, a player removes one energy counter from themselves.
glossary.zh: 能量符号{E}代表一个能量指示物。要支付{E}，牌手从其自身移除一个能量指示物。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows a creature that could have attacked to support another creature. See rule 702.154, “Enlist.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许一个能够攻击的生物协助另一个生物。参见规则702.154，“征列”。

glossary.en: A nontoken permanent “enters the battlefield” when it’s moved onto the battlefield from another zone. A token “enters the battlefield” when it’s created. See rules 403.3, 603.6a, 603.6d, and 614.12.
glossary.zh: 一个非衍生物永久物当从其他区域转移到战场时“进入战场”。一个永久物当被创造时“进入战场”。参见规则403.3，603.6a，603.6d以及614.12。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player choose all modes for a spell rather than just the number specified. See rule 702.42, “Entwine.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手为一个咒语选择所有的模式，而不仅仅是指定数量的模式。参见规则702.42，“打包”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player copy a spell at the beginning of each of their upkeeps at the expense of casting any other spells for the rest of the game. See rule 702.50, “Epic.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手在他的每个维持开始时都复制该咒语，但要付出该盘游戏余下的部分不能施放其他咒语的代价。参见规则702.50，“历传”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player attach an Equipment to a creature they control. See rule 301, “Artifacts,” and rule 702.6, “Equip.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手将武具贴附于他所操控的生物上。参见规则301，“神器”以及规则702.6，“佩带”。

glossary.en: An artifact subtype. Equipment can be attached to creatures. See rule 301, “Artifacts,” and rule 702.6, “Equip.”
glossary.zh: 一个神器副类别。武具可以贴附于生物上。参见规则301，“神器”以及规则702.6，“佩带”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability on some modal spells that adds a cost for choosing additional modes. See rule 702.120, “Escalate.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让一些具有模式的咒语可以付费选择额外的模式。参见规则702.120，“增效”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player cast a card from their graveyard. See rule 702.138, “Escape.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使牌手能从其坟墓场施放一张牌。参见规则702.138，“逸脱”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player exile a creature card from their graveyard to create an eternalized token version of that card. See rule 702.129, “Eternalize.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使牌手从其坟墓场中放逐一张生物牌，并派出一个该牌的永生衍生物版本。参见规则702.129，“永生”。

glossary.en: An ability that restricts what creatures can block an attacking creature. See rules 509.1b–c.
glossary.zh: 限制哪些生物可以阻挡攻击生物的异能。参见规则509.1b至c。

glossary.en: Anything that happens in a game. See rule 700.1.
glossary.zh: 游戏中发生的任何事。参见规则700.1。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that causes a permanent to be sacrificed when it enters the battlefield. See rule 702.74, “Evoke.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，当永久物进入战场时令其被牺牲。参见规则702.74，“呼魂”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets you put a +1/+1 counter on a creature when a larger creature enters the battlefield under your control. See rule 702.100, “Evolve.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，每当一个更大的生物在你的操控下进入战场时，让你将+1/+1指示物放在生物上。参见规则702.100，“进化”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that can make a creature better in combat. See rule 702.83, “Exalted.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物在战斗中更好。参见规则702.83，“颂威”。

glossary.en: To swap two things, such as objects, sets of objects, or life totals. See rule 701.10, “Exchange.”
glossary.zh: 交换两个东西，例如物件、一组物件，或生命总值。参见规则701.10，“交换”。

glossary.en: A keyword action that stops a permanent from untapping during the next untap step of the player who exerted it. See rule 701.39, “Exert.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，阻止一个永久物于耗竭之的牌手之下一个重置步骤中重置。参见规则701.39，“耗竭”。

glossary.en: Damage dealt to a creature greater than what would be lethal damage or damage dealt to a planeswalker greater than its loyalty. See rule 120.4a.
glossary.zh: 对生物造成之大于其致命伤害的部分伤害，或是对鹏洛客造成之大于其忠诚的部分伤害。参见规则120.4a。

glossary.en:
1. A zone. Exile is essentially a holding area for cards. It used to be known as the “removed-from-the-game” zone.
2. To put an object into the exile zone from whatever zone it’s currently in. An “exiled” card is one that’s been put into the exile zone.
See rule 406, “Exile.”
glossary.zh:
1. 一个区域。放逐区本质上是保留牌的区域。它之前被称为“移出游戏”区。
2. 从一个物件当前的区域中放到放逐区。一张“被放逐”的牌指被放进放逐区的牌。
参见规则406，“放逐”。

glossary.en: A card’s expansion symbol is a small icon normally printed below the right edge of the illustration that has no effect on game play. See rule 206, “Expansion Symbol.”
glossary.zh: 牌的版本符号是印在图片右下角对游戏没有任何效应的小符号。参见规则206，“版本符号”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets you sacrifice a creature for a benefit. See rule 702.110, “Exploit.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使你通过牺牲生物来获得优势。参见规则702.110，“榨取”。

glossary.en: A keyword action that causes a player to reveal the top card of their library and then to take different actions depending on whether a land card is revealed this way. See rule 701.40, “Explore.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，使牌手展示其牌库顶牌，然后根据展示的牌是否是地牌采取不同的动作。参见规则701.40，“勘察”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets you gain life and have opponents lose life whenever you cast a spell. See rule 702.101, “Extort.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，每当你施放咒语时让你得到生命并且让对手失去生命。参见规则702.101，“敲诈”。

glossary.en: A turn created by an effect of a spell or ability. See rule 500.7. For rules about extra turns in a multiplayer game using the shared team turns option, see 805.8. For rules about extra turns in a Grand Melee game, see rule 807.4.
glossary.zh: 由咒语或异能的效应所创造的回合。参见规则500.7。对于使用队伍共享回合模式的多人游戏的额外回合规则，参见规则805.8。对于大型混战玩法游戏的额外回合规则，参见规则807.4。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets you choose whether to create Servo tokens or put +1/+1 counters on a creature. See rule 702.123, “Fabricate.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让你选择派出自动机衍生物或者在生物上放置+1/+1指示物。参见规则702.123，“装配”。

glossary.en: A keyword action that causes a player to choose one of two listed choices. See rule 701.53, “Face a Villainous Choice.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，使牌手在两个列出的选项中选择一项。参见规则701.53，“面临邪恶抉择”。

glossary.en:
1. A card is “face down” if it’s physically positioned so the card back is showing. Cards in some zones are normally kept face down. See section 4, “Zones.”
2. A status a permanent may have. See rule 110.5 and rule 702.37, “Morph.”
3. Face-down spells have additional rules. See rule 708, “Face-Down Spells and Permanents,” and rule 702.37, “Morph.”
glossary.zh:
1. 如果一张牌被放置在牌背朝上的位置，该牌“牌面朝下”。牌在一些区域中一般情况下都保持牌面朝下的状态。参见第4章，“区域”。
2. 永久物可能拥有的一个状态。参见规则110.5以及702.37，“变身”。
3. 牌面朝下的咒语具有额外规则。参见规则708，“牌面朝下的咒语和永久物”，以及规则702.37，“变身”。

glossary.en:
1. A card is “face up” if it’s physically positioned so the card front is showing. Cards in some zones are normally kept face up. See section 4, “Zones.”
2. A default status a permanent may have. See rule 110.5 and rule 702.37, “Morph.”
glossary.zh:
1. 如果一张牌被放置在牌面朝上的位置，该牌“牌面朝上”。牌在一些区域中一般情况下都保持牌面朝上的状态。参见第4章，“区域”。
2. 永久物可能拥有的一个状态。参见规则110.5以及702.37，“变身”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that limits how long a permanent remains on the battlefield. See rule 702.32, “Fading.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，限制一个永久物能够留在战场上的时间。参见规则702.32，“消退”。

glossary.en: To manipulate some of the cards on top of an opponent’s library. See rule 701.22, “Fateseal.”
glossary.zh: 操纵对手牌库顶的一些牌。参见规则701.22，“论命”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that restricts how a creature may be blocked. See rule 702.36, “Fear.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，限制一个生物能如何被阻挡。参见规则702.36，“恐惧”。

glossary.en: When two creatures fight, each deals damage equal to its power to the other. See rule 701.12, “Fight.”
glossary.zh: 当两个生物互斗时，它们对彼此造成等同于它们力量的伤害。参见规则701.12，“互斗”。

glossary.en: A counter that exiles the permanent it is on if that permanent would go to the graveyard from the battlefield. See rule 122.1h.
glossary.zh: 一种指示物，在永久物将从战场进入坟墓场时改为放逐之。参见规则122.1h。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a creature deal its combat damage before other creatures. See rule 702.7, “First Strike.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物在其他生物之前造成其战斗伤害。参见规则702.7，“先攻”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that can make a creature better in combat. See rule 702.25, “Flanking.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物在战斗中更好。参见规则702.25，“侧面攻击”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player play a card any time they could cast an instant. See rule 702.8, “Flash.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手在任何其可以施放瞬间的时候使用一张牌。参见规则702.8，“闪现”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player cast a card from their graveyard. See rule 702.34, “Flashback.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手从其坟墓场中施放一张牌。参见规则702.34，“返照”。

glossary.en: Text in italics (but not in parentheses) in the text box of a card that has no effect on play. See rule 207.2.
glossary.zh: 牌的文字栏中用斜体（但不在括号中）且对游戏没有任何影响的叙述。参见规则207.2。

glossary.en: An italicized word with no rules meaning that provides a flavorful description of an ability. See rule 207.2d.
glossary.zh: 一个斜体印刷的词，使得异能的叙述更显鲜活，但没有规则含义。参见规则207.2d。

glossary.en: Cards with a two-part card frame (one part of which is printed upside down) on a single card. See rule 710, “Flip Cards.”
glossary.zh: 在一张牌上具有两部分牌边框（其中之一上下颠倒）的牌。参见规则710，“倒转牌”。

glossary.en: A status a permanent may have. See rule 110.5 and rule 710, “Flip Cards.” See also Unflipped.
glossary.zh: 一个永久物可能具有的状态。参见规则110.5以及规则710，“倒转牌”。另参见未倒转。

glossary.en: A method of randomization with two possible outcomes of equal likelihood. See rule 705, “Flipping a Coin.”
glossary.zh: 一个随机决定两个相同可能性结果的方法。参见规则705，“掷硬币”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that restricts how a creature may be blocked. See rule 702.9, “Flying.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，限制一个生物如何被阻挡。参见规则702.9，“飞行”。

glossary.en: A Food token is a colorless artifact token with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.” For more information about predefined tokens, see rule 111.10.
glossary.zh: 食品衍生物是具有“{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命”的无色衍生神器。欲知关于预定义衍生物的更多信息，参见规则111.10。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that creates a 2/2 red Rebel creature token and then attaches the Equipment with the ability to that token. See rule 702.163, “For Mirrodin!”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，派出一个2/2红色反抗军衍生生物，并将具有该异能的武具贴附于该衍生物上。参见规则702.163，“秘罗万岁！”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows an activated ability to be activated from a player’s hand. See rule 702.57, “Forecast.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许从牌手手上起动一个起动式异能。参见规则702.57，“预报”。

glossary.en: One of the five basic land types. Any land with this subtype has the ability “{T}: Add {G}.” See rule 305.6.
glossary.zh: 五种基本地类别中的一种。任何具有此副类别的地具有异能“{T}：加{G}。”参见规则305.6。

glossary.en: See Typecycling.
glossary.zh: 参见类别循环。

glossary.en: See Landwalk.
glossary.zh: 参见地行者。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player exile cards from their hand and cast them for an alternative cost on future turns. See rule 702.143, “Foretell.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使牌手从其手上放逐牌，并在将来的回合中使用替代性费用施放之。参见规则702.143，“预示”。

glossary.en: A card exiled using the foretell special action becomes foretold. Other effects can also make an exiled card foretold. A spell was foretold if it was a foretold card in exile before it was cast.
glossary.zh: 使用预示此特殊动作被放逐的牌成为已预示。其他效应也可以使一张被放逐的牌成为已预示。如果一个咒语在被施放之前是一张放逐区中已预示的牌，则该咒语为已预示。

glossary.en: An artifact subtype. Fortifications can be attached to lands. See rule 301, “Artifacts,” and rule 702.67, “Fortify.”
glossary.zh: 一个神器副类别。工事可以贴附于地上。参见规则301，“神器”，以及规则702.67，“构工”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player attach a Fortification to a land they control. See rule 301, “Artifacts,” and rule 702.67, “Fortify.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手将工事牌贴附于其操控的地上。参见规则301，“神器”，以及规则702.67，“构工”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that can make a creature better in combat. See rule 702.68, “Frenzy.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物在战斗中更好。参见规则702.68，“狂热”。

glossary.en: A multiplayer variant in which a group of players compete as individuals against each other. See rule 806, “Free-for-All Variant.”
glossary.zh: 一个多人玩法，牌手们会以个人方式来互相展开对抗。参见规则806，“自由竞赛玩法”。

glossary.en: A variant of the partner ability that lets two legendary creature cardss be your commander in the Commander variant rather than one if both have the “friends forever” ability. See rule 702.124, “Partner,” and rule 903, “Commander.”
glossary.zh: 拍档异能的一种变化形式。在指挥官玩法中，如果两张传奇生物牌均具有Friends forever异能，则可将这两张牌用作你的指挥官，而非只使用一个。参见规则702.124，“拍档”，及规则903，“指挥官”。

glossary.en: A player has a full party if the number of creatures in their party is four. See rule 700.8.
glossary.zh: 当牌手冒险团中的生物数量为四时，其冒险团满编。参见规则700.8。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows a player to cast both halves of a split card. See rule 702.102, “Fuse.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手可以施放连体牌的两边。参见规则702.102，“融咒”。

glossary.en: A split card on the stack that has been cast using the fuse ability or a copy of such a card. See rule 702.102, “Fuse.”
glossary.zh: 一张堆叠中的连体牌，使用融咒异能施放，或该种牌的复制品。参见规则702.102，“融咒”。

glossary.en: Any player in the Emperor multiplayer variant who isn’t an emperor. See rule 809, “Emperor Variant.”
glossary.zh: 皇帝多人玩法中，任何不是皇帝的牌手。参见规则809，“皇帝玩法”。

glossary.en: Mana in a cost represented by numerical symbols (such as {1}) or variable symbols (such as {X}) that can be paid with mana of any type. See rule 107.4.
glossary.zh: 一般法术力指没有被有色法术力符号表示的费用；它可以被任何类别的法术力支付。参见规则107.4。

glossary.en: An obsolete term for a non-Aura enchantment. Cards printed with this text have received errata in the Oracle card reference.
glossary.zh: 一个非灵气结界的废止用语。印有此叙述的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已经得到勘误。

glossary.en: A keyword action that causes a creature to be goaded until a player’s next turn. See rule 701.38, “Goad.”
glossary.zh: 一一个关键字动作，使一个生物直到某牌手的下一个回合以前成为被煽惑。参见规则701.38，“煽惑”。

glossary.en: A designation a permanent can have. Goaded creatures are forced to attack and to attack a player other than the player that caused it to be goaded. See rule 701.38, “Goad.”
glossary.zh: 永久物可拥有的一种称号。被煽惑的生物会被强制攻击，且若能攻击使其成为被煽惑的牌手以外的牌手，则须如此作。参见规则701.38，“煽惑”。

glossary.en: A Gold token is a colorless artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.” For more information on predefined tokens, see rule 111.10.
glossary.zh: 黄金衍生物是具有“牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力。”的无色衍生神器。欲知关于预定义衍生物的更多信息，参见规则111.10。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that has a permanent enter the battlefield with +1/+1 counters on it and can move those counters to other creatures. See rule 702.58, “Graft.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让一个永久物进入战场带有+1/+1指示物，以及这些指示物可以移动到其他生物上。参见规则702.58，“接殖”。

glossary.en: A multiplayer variant in which a large group of players (usually ten or more) compete as individuals against each other. See rule 807, “Grand Melee Variant.”
glossary.zh: 一种多人玩法，很多牌手（通常是十位以上）以个人方式展开对抗。参见规则807，“大型混战玩法”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that creates copies of a spell. See rule 702.69, “Gravestorm.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，创造咒语的复制。参见规则702.69，“坟场风暴”。

glossary.en:
1. A zone. A player’s graveyard is their discard pile.
2. All the cards in a player’s graveyard.
See rule 404, “Graveyard.”
glossary.zh:
1. 一个区域。牌手的坟墓场是他的弃牌堆。
2. 所有处于一位牌手坟墓场中的牌。
参见规则404，“坟墓场”。

glossary.en:
1. A zone. A player’s hand is where that player holds cards they have drawn but not played yet.
2. All the cards in a player’s hand.
See rule 402, “Hand.”
glossary.zh:
1. 一个游戏区域。牌手的手牌为牌手拿自己抓起且尚未使用的牌的地方。
2. 牌手手上的所有牌。
参见规则402，“手牌”。

glossary.en: A characteristic that only vanguards have. See rule 211, “Hand Modifier.”
glossary.zh: 一个只有先锋牌才有的特征。参见规则211，“手牌修正”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a creature ignore the “summoning sickness” rule. See rule 702.10, “Haste,” and rule 302.6.
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物可以忽略“召唤失调”规则。参见规则702.10，“敏捷”，以及规则302.6。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that exiles cards. A card exiled this way “haunts” a creature targeted by the haunt ability. See rule 702.55, “Haunt.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，放逐牌。以此法放逐的牌“缠身”到由缠身异能所指定的目标生物上。参见规则702.55，“缠身”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that precludes a permanent or player from being targeted by an opponent. See rule 702.11, “Hexproof.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让永久物或牌手避免成为对手的目标。参见规则702.11，“辟邪”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows a conspiracy card to be put into the command zone face down. See rule 702.106, “Hidden Agenda.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让诡局牌以牌面朝下的方式置于统帅区。参见规则702.106，“秘案”。

glossary.en: A zone in which not all players can be expected to see the cards’ faces. See rule 400.2. See also Public Zone.
glossary.zh: 不是所有牌手都应该可以看到牌面的区域。参见规则400.2。另参见公开区域。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player store a secret card. See rule 702.75, “Hideaway.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手藏起一张秘密的牌。参见规则702.75，“掩蔽”。

glossary.en: An object is historic if it has the legendary supertype, the artifact card type, or the Saga subtype. See rule 700.6.
glossary.zh: 如果一个物件具有传奇此超类别、或具有神器此牌类别、或具有传纪此副类别，它便是史迹。参见规则700.6。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that restricts how a creature may be blocked. See rule 702.31, “Horsemanship.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，限制生物如何阻挡。参见规则702.31，“马术”。

glossary.en: A card with one or more hybrid mana symbols in its mana cost. See rule 202.2f.
glossary.zh: 在法术力费用中具有一个或数个混血法术力符号的牌。参见规则202.2f。

glossary.en: A mana symbol that represents a cost that can be paid in one of two ways. See rule 107.4.
glossary.zh: 一个法术力符号，表示费用可以用两种中的一种支付。参见规则107.4。

glossary.zhname: 混血非瑞克西亚法术力符号
glossary.en: A mana symbol that represents a cost that can be paid in one of three ways. See rule 107.4.
glossary.zh: 一个法术力符号，表示费用可以用三种中的一种支付。参见规则107.4。

glossary.en: A Junk token is a colorless artifact token with {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.” For more information about predefined tokens, see rule 111.10.
glossary.zh: 废料衍生物是具有“{T}，牺牲此神器：放逐你的牌库顶牌。本回合中，你可以使用该牌。只能于法术时机起动。”的无色衍生神器。欲知关于预定义衍生物的更多信息，参见规则111.10。

glossary.en: See Intervening “If” Clause.
glossary.zh: 参见以“若”开头的子句。

glossary.en: An action that violates the rules of the game and/or requirements or restrictions created by effects. See rule 730, “Handling Illegal Actions.”
glossary.zh: 一个违反游戏规则和/或效应所创造的要求或限制的动作。参见规则730，“处理非法动作”。

glossary.en: A target that no longer exists or no longer meets the specifications stated by the spell or ability that’s targeting it. See rule 608.2b.
glossary.zh: 一个目标不再存在或不在符合目标它的该咒语或异能所列出的特别要求。参见规则608.2b。

glossary.en: A picture printed on the upper half of a card that has no effect on game play. See rule 203, “Illustration.”
glossary.zh: 印在牌上面一半的图片，对游戏没有效应。参见规则203，“图片”。

glossary.en: Information printed directly below the text box that has no effect on game play. See rule 213, “Information Below the Text Box.”
glossary.zh: 在文字栏下方印的信息，对游戏没有效应。参见规则213，“文字栏下方信息”。

glossary.en: “Imprint” used to be a keyword ability. It is now an ability word and has no rules meaning. All cards printed with the imprint keyword have received errata in the Oracle card reference.
glossary.zh: “压印”曾经是关键字异能。现在为没有规则意义的异能提示。所有印有关键字压印的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets you tap artifacts rather than pay mana to cast a spell. See rule 702.126, “Improvise.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使你可以在施放咒语时横置神器代替法术力来支付费用。

glossary.en: An obsolete term for the battlefield. Cards that were printed with text that contain the phrases “in play,” “from play,” “into play,” or the like are referring to the battlefield and have received errata in the Oracle card reference. See Battlefield.
glossary.zh: 战场的已废止用词。印有叙述中包含“场上”、“从场上”、或其他类似引用战场用词的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误。参见战场。

glossary.en: An instant spell that’s been cast, or an activated ability that’s been activated, while another spell or ability is on the stack has been cast or activated “in response to” the earlier spell or ability. See rule 117.7.
glossary.zh: 于另一个堆叠上的咒语或异能被施放或起动时，施放一个咒语或起动一个异能，指对前一个咒语或异能“作出响应”。参见规则117.7。

glossary.en: A keyword action that creates an Incubator token with a specified number of +1/+1 counters on it. See rule 701.51, “Incubate.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，派出一个上面有若干+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物。参见规则701.51，“抚育”。

glossary.en: An Incubator token is a transforming double-faced token. Its front face is a colorless Incubator artifact with “{2}: Transform this artifact.” Its back face is a 0/0 colorless Phyrexian artifact creature named “Phyrexian Token.” For more information about predefined tokens, see rule 111.10.
glossary.zh: 抚育器衍生物是转化式双面衍生物。其正面是无色抚育器神器，且具有“{2}：转化此神器。”其背面是名为非瑞人衍生物的0/0无色非瑞人神器生物。欲知关于预定义衍生物的更多信息，参见规则111.10。

glossary.en: See Dependency.
glossary.zh: 参见从属关系。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that precludes a permanent from being destroyed. See rule 702.12.
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让永久物不会被消灭。参见规则702.12。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that affects how an object deals damage to creatures and players. See rule 702.90, “Infect.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，影响一个物件如何对生物或牌手造成伤害。参见规则702.90，“侵染”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that can exile the top card of a player’s library. See rule 702.115, “Ingest.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，可以放逐牌手的牌库顶牌。参见规则702.115，“摄食”。

glossary.en: A designation a player can have. Some effects instruct a player to take the initiative. The player with the initiative ventures into Undercity whenever they take the initiative and at the beginning of their upkeep. See rule 723, “The Initiative.”
glossary.zh: 牌手能获得的一种称号。一些效应使牌手掌握先制。握有先制的牌手在其掌握先制、及在其维持开始时深入地底城。参见规则723，“先制”。

glossary.en: A card type. An instant is not a permanent. See rule 304, “Instants.”
glossary.zh: 一个牌类别。瞬间不是永久物。参见规则304，“瞬间”。

glossary.en: Effects that use the word “instead” are replacement effects. The word “instead” indicates what an event will be replaced with. See rule 614, “Replacement Effects.”
glossary.zh: 使用“改为”一词的效应为替代性效应。“改为”一词指明将要被替代的事件。参见规则614，“替代性效应”。

glossary.en: An obsolete card type. All cards printed with this card type are now instants. All abilities that, as printed, said a player could “play as an interrupt” can now be activated like any other activated abilities (unless they’re mana abilities, in which case they follow those rules instead). All relevant cards have been given errata in the Oracle card reference.
glossary.zh: 一个已废止的牌类别。所有印有此类别的牌现在都是瞬间。所有印有牌手可以“视为干涉般使用”的异能现在都可以和任何其他起动式异能一样被起动（除非是法术力异能，它们改为遵循对应规则）。所有相关的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误。

glossary.en: A specially worded condition checked as a triggered ability would trigger and again as it would resolve. See rule 603.4.
glossary.zh: 一个特别用词的条件，检查一个触发式异能是否会触发，并且在将结算时再次检查。参见规则603.4。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that restricts how a creature may be blocked. See rule 702.13, “Intimidate.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，限制一个生物可以怎样被阻挡。参见规则702.13，“威吓”。

glossary.en: A keyword action that creates a Clue artifact token. See rule 701.36, “Investigate.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，派出一个线索衍生神器。参见规则701.36，“探查”。

glossary.en: One of the five basic land types. Any land with this subtype has the ability “{T}: Add {U}.” See rule 305.6.
glossary.zh: 五种基本地类别中的一种。任何具有此副类别的地都具有异能“{T}：加{U}。”参见规则305.6。

glossary.en: See Typecycling.
glossary.zh: 参见类别循环。

glossary.en: An obsolete keyword ability that meant “This creature can’t attack unless defending player controls an Island” and “When you control no Islands, sacrifice this creature.” Cards printed with this ability have been given errata in the Oracle card reference.
glossary.zh: 一个已废止的关键字异能，指“除非防御牌手操控海岛，否则此生物不能攻击”和“当你不操控海岛时，牺牲此生物”。印有此异能的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误。

glossary.en: See Landwalk.
glossary.zh: 参见地行者。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player cast a card from their graveyard by discarding a card. See rule 702.133, “Jump-Start.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许牌手弃一张牌来从坟场施放一张牌。参见规则702.133，“再起”。

glossary.en: A game term, such as “flying” or “haste,” used as shorthand for a longer ability or group of abilities. See rule 702, “Keyword Abilities.”
glossary.zh: 一个游戏用语，例如“飞行”或“敏捷”，用来简述一个很长的异能或一组异能。参见规则702，“关键字异能”。

glossary.en: A verb, such as “destroy” or “cast,” used as a game term rather than as its normal English meaning. See rule 701, “Keyword Actions.”
glossary.zh: 一个放置在物件上的标示物，赋予其一个关键字异能以影响其特征。参见规则122，“指示物”。

glossary.en: A marker placed on an object that modifies its characteristics by granting it a keyword. See rule 122, “Counters.”
glossary.zh: 一个动词，例如“消灭”或“施放”，用来作为游戏用语而不是其正常的词意。参见规则701，“关键字动作”。

glossary.en: Kicker is a keyword ability that represents an optional additional cost. A spell has been kicked if its controller declared the intention to pay any or all of its kicker costs. See rule 702.33, “Kicker.”
glossary.zh: 增幅是一个关键字异能，表示一个选择性的额外费用。如果一个咒语的操控者宣告将支付其任何或所有的增幅费用，则该咒语已增幅。参见规则702.33，“增幅”。

glossary.en: A card type. Whether or not a kindred is a permanent depends on its other card type. See rule 308, “Kindreds.”
glossary.zh: 一个牌类别。亲缘是否为永久物取决于它的其他牌类别。参见规则308，“亲缘”。

glossary.en: A card type. A land is a permanent. See rule 305, “Lands.”
glossary.zh: 一个牌类别。地是永久物。参见规则305，“地”。

glossary.en: A subtype that’s correlated to the land card type. See rule 305, “Lands.” See rule 205.3i for the list of land types.
glossary.zh: 一个副类别，对应地牌的类别。参见规则305，“地”。地类别的列表参见规则205.3i。

glossary.en: A generic term for a group of keyword abilities that restrict whether a creature may be blocked. See rule 702.14, “Landwalk.”
glossary.zh: 一组关键字异能的集合，限制生物如何可以被阻挡。参见规则702.14，“地行者”。

glossary.en: Information about an object that’s no longer in the zone it’s expected to be in, or information about a player who’s no longer in the game. This information captures that object’s last existence in that zone or that player’s last existence in the game. See rules 113.7a, 608.2b, 608.2h, and 800.4h.
glossary.zh: 有关一个不再存在于它应在区域的物件，或有关一个不再在游戏中的牌手的信息。信息将抓住该物件在该区域中存在最后一刻的信息，或牌手在离开游戏前最后一刻的信息。参见规则113.7a、608.2b、608.2g以及800.4h。

glossary.en: A system used to determine in which order continuous effects are applied. See rule 613, “Interaction of Continuous Effects.” See also Dependency, Timestamp Order.
glossary.zh: 一个用来决定持续性效应生效顺序的系统。参见规则613，“持续性效应的互动”。另参见从属关系、时间印记顺序。

glossary.en: A keyword action that lets a player add a Lesson card to their hand from outside the game or discard a card to draw a card. See rule 701.45, “Learn.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使牌手可以从游戏外将一张课程牌置于其手上，或弃一张牌然后抓一张牌。参见规则701.45，“温习”。

glossary.en: A permanent “leaves the battlefield” when it’s moved from the battlefield to another zone, or (if it’s phased in) when it leaves the game because its owner leaves the game. See rules 603.6c and 603.10.
glossary.zh: 当一个永久物从战场移到另一个区域时，或（如果它跃回的话）当它因为其拥有者离开游戏而离开游戏时，它“离开战场”。参见规则603.6c以及603.10。

glossary.en: Information printed directly below the text box that has no effect on game play. See rule 213, “Information Below the Text Box.”
glossary.zh: 在文字栏下印刷的信息，对游戏本身没有任何影响。参见规则213，“文字栏下方信息”。

glossary.en: An obsolete creature type. Cards printed with this subtype have been given errata in the Oracle card reference so they have the legendary supertype instead. See Legendary.
glossary.zh: 一个被废止的生物类别。印有此副类别的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误，改为具有传奇超类别。参见传奇。

glossary.en: A supertype that’s normally relevant on permanents. See rule 205.4, “Supertypes.” See also Legend Rule.
glossary.zh: 一个超类别，一般情况下与永久物有关。参见规则205.4，“超类别”。另参见传奇规则。

glossary.en: A state-based action that causes a player who controls two or more legendary permanents with the same name to put all but one into their owners’ graveyards. See rule 704.5j.
glossary.zh: 一个状态动作，令操控两个或更多具有相同名称的传奇永久物的操控者，将其中一个以外的都放进它们拥有者的坟墓场。参见规则704.5j。

glossary.en: An amount of damage greater than or equal to a creature’s toughness. See rules 120.4a, 120.6, 510.1, and 704.5g.
glossary.zh: 伤害的数量大于或等于生物的防御力。参见规则120.4a、120.6、510.1以及704.5g。

glossary.en: A numerical designation a permanent may have. A Class enchantment’s level determines what other abilities it has. See rule 716, “Class Cards.”
glossary.zh: 永久物可具有的一种数字形式的称号。职业结界的等级决定其具有哪些其他异能。参见规则716，“职业牌”。

glossary.en: A symbol that represents a keyword ability indicating abilities, power, and toughness a leveler card may have. See rule 107.8 and rule 711, “Leveler Cards.”
glossary.zh: 该符号表示了一个关键字异能，列出升级牌可能具有的异能、力量以及防御力。参见规则107.8以及规则711，“升级牌”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that can put level counters on a creature. See rule 702.87, “Level Up.” For class level abilities of Class cards, see rule 716, “Class Cards.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，在生物上放置等级指示物。参见规则702.87，“升级”。关于职业牌的职业等级异能，参见规则716，“职业牌”。

glossary.en: Cards with striated text boxes and three power/toughness boxes. See rule 711, “Leveler Cards.”
glossary.zh: 具有条状文字栏以及三个力量/防御力方格的牌。参见规则711，“升级牌”。

glossary.en:
1. A zone. A player’s library is where that player draws cards from.
2. All the cards in a player’s library.
See rule 401, “Library.”
glossary.zh:
1. 一个区域。牌库是牌手抓牌的地方。
2. 牌手牌库中的所有牌。
参见规则401，“牌库”。

glossary.en: Each player has an amount of “life,” represented by that player’s “life total.” Life may be gained or lost. See rule 119, “Life.”
glossary.zh: 每位牌手都具有一定数量的“生命”，表示该牌手的“总生命”。生命可以得到或失去。参见规则119，“生命”。

glossary.en: A characteristic that only vanguards have. See rule 212, “Life Modifier.”
glossary.zh: 一个只有先锋牌才有的特征。参见规则212，“生命修正”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that causes a player to gain life. See rule 702.15, “Lifelink.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手得到生命。参见规则702.15，“系命”。

glossary.en: A way of playing in which each player gets a quantity of unopened Magic product and creates their own deck on the spot. See rule 100.2.
glossary.zh: 一种玩法，每位牌手得到一定数量的未开封万智牌产品，并用它们创造自己的套牌。参见规则100.2。

glossary.en: An optional rule used in some multiplayer games that limits what a player can affect. See rule 801, “Limited Range of Influence Option.”
glossary.zh: 在一些多人游戏中使用的可选规则，限制牌手能够影响的事物。参见规则801，“限制影响范围模式”。

glossary.en: Two abilities printed on the same object such that one of them causes actions to be taken or objects to be affected and the other one directly refers to those actions or objects. See rule 607, “Linked Abilities.”
glossary.zh: 在同一个物件上印的两个异能，其中一个将直接影响另一个提到的将进行的动作或受影响的物件。参见规则607，“关联异能”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability found on some Vehicles that turns them into a creature during your turn. See rule 702.161, “Living Metal.”
glossary.zh: 一个见于载具上的关键字异能，能够令其在你的回合中变为生物。参见规则702.161，“金属生命体”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that creates a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token and then attaches the Equipment with the ability to that token. See rule 702.92, “Living Weapon.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，派出一个0/0黑色非瑞人／病菌衍生生物，并将具有该异能的武具贴附于该衍生物上。参见规则702.92，“活化武器”。

glossary.en: An obsolete term for an Aura. Cards printed with this text have received errata in the Oracle card reference.
glossary.zh: 灵气已废止的用词。印有此叙述的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误。

glossary.en: Informal term for the current system of mulligan rules. See rule 103.5.
glossary.zh: 指代当前的再调度规则的非正式用词。参见规则103.5。

glossary.en: A set of actions that could be repeated indefinitely. See rule 729, “Taking Shortcuts.”
glossary.zh: 一系列可以重复无数次的动作。参见规则729，“进行简化”。

glossary.en: There are several ways to lose the game. See rule 104, “Ending the Game,” rule 810.8 (for additional rules for Two-Headed Giant games), rule 809.5 (for additional rules for Emperor games), and rule 903.10 (for an additional rule for Commander games).
glossary.zh: 有多种方式输去游戏。参见规则104，“结束游戏”、规则810.8（双头巨人玩法的额外规则）、规则809.5（皇帝玩法的额外规则）以及规则903.10（指挥官玩法的额外规则）。

glossary.en:
1. Part of a card that only planeswalker cards have. A planeswalker card’s loyalty is printed in its lower right corner. See rule 209, “Loyalty.”
2. A characteristic that only planeswalkers have. See rule 306.5.
glossary.zh:
1. 只有鹏洛客牌具有的牌的一部分。鹏洛客牌的忠诚印在其右下角。参见规则209，“忠诚”。
2. 只有鹏洛客具有的特征。参见规则306.5。

glossary.en: An activated ability with a loyalty symbol in its cost. See rule 606, “Loyalty Abilities.”
glossary.zh: 费用中具有忠诚符号的起动式异能。参见规则606，“忠诚异能”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player cast a card they discard. See rule 702.35, “Madness.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许牌手施放他所弃掉的牌。参见规则702.35，“疯魔”。

glossary.en: The game in which a spell (or ability) that created a subgame was cast (or activated). See rule 726, “Subgames.”
glossary.zh: 施放（或起动）了创造一个子游戏之咒语（或异能）所在的游戏。参见规则726，“子游戏”。

glossary.en: Part of the turn. The first, or precombat, main phase is the second phase of the turn. The second, or postcombat, main phase is the fourth phase of the turn. See rule 505, “Main Phase.”
glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。第一个行动阶段，或战斗前行动阶段，是回合中的第二个阶段。第二个行动阶段，或战斗后行动阶段，是回合中的第四个阶段。参见规则505，“行动阶段”。

glossary.en: The primary resource in the game. It is spent to pay costs, usually when casting spells and activating abilities. See rule 106, “Mana,” rule 107.4, and rule 202, “Mana Cost and Color.”
glossary.zh: 游戏中的主要资源。法术力用来支付费用，这通常发生在施放咒语或起动异能时。参见规则106，“法术力”，规则107.4，和规则202，“法术力费用和颜色”。

glossary.en: An activated or triggered ability that could create mana and doesn’t use the stack. See rule 605, “Mana Abilities.”
glossary.zh: 一类起动式或触发式异能，它们可以产生法术力，且不使用堆叠。参见规则605，“法术力异能”。

glossary.en: Older versions of the rules stated that unspent mana caused a player to lose life; this was called “mana burn.” That rule no longer exists.
glossary.zh: 较老版本的规则中叙述未用完的法术力会导致牌手失去生命；这称为“法术力灼烧”。这条规则已不复存在。

glossary.en: A characteristic, and part of a card. A card’s mana cost is indicated by the mana symbols printed in its upper right corner. See rule 107.4 and rule 202, “Mana Cost and Color.”
glossary.zh: 牌的一部分，且是一种特征。一张牌的法术力费用由印在该牌右上角的法术力符号所指示。参见规则107.4和规则202，“法术力费用和颜色”。

glossary.en: Where mana created by an effect is temporarily stored. See rule 106.4.
glossary.zh: 由效应产生的法术力临时存储的地方。参见规则106.4。

glossary.en: An obsolete card type. All cards printed with this card type are now instants. All abilities that, as printed, said a player could “play as a mana source” are now mana abilities. All relevant cards have been given errata in the Oracle card reference.
glossary.zh: 一种已废止的牌类别。所有印制为此类别的牌现在都是瞬间。所有印制为叙述牌手可以“视同法术力源一般使用”的异能现在都是法术力异能。与此相关的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已经获得勘误。

glossary.en: An icon that represents mana or a mana cost. See rule 107.4.
glossary.zh: 表示法术力或法术力费用的符号。参见规则107.4。

glossary.en: The total amount of mana in a mana cost, regardless of color. See rule 202.3.
glossary.zh: 一个法术力费用中法术力的总数，不计较颜色。参见规则202.3。

glossary.en: A keyword action that puts a card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. See rule 701.34, “Manifest,” and rule 708, “Face-Down Spells and Permanents.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，将牌以牌面朝下的方式作为2/2生物放进战场。参见规则701.34，“显化”，和规则708，“牌面朝下的咒语和永久物”。

glossary.en: A Map token is a colorless Map artifact token with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.” See rule 701.40, “Explore.” For more information about predefined tokens, see rule 110.10.
glossary.zh: 地图衍生物是具有“{1}，{T}，牺牲此神器：令目标由你操控的生物勘察。只能于法术时机起动。”的无色衍生神器。欲知关于预先定义的衍生物的更多信息，参见规则111.10。

glossary.en: A multiplayer game or a two-player series of games (usually best-two-of-three) played in a tournament. See rule 100.6.
glossary.zh: 在比赛中进行的一盘多人游戏或一系列双人游戏（通常是三局两胜制）。参见规则100.6。

glossary.en: The number of cards in hand a player must discard down to during their cleanup step. See rule 402.2 and 514.1.
glossary.zh: 牌手必须于清除阶段中将多余的牌弃掉，直到手牌的数量少于或等于该数字。参见规则402.2和514.1。

glossary.en: A variant of the morph ability that puts a +1/+1 counter on the creature as it turns face up. See rule 702.37, “Morph.”
glossary.zh: 变身异能的一种变化，于生物翻回正面时在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。参见规则702.37，“变身”。

glossary.en: To turn two members of a meld pair so their back faces are up and combined into one oversized Magic card. See rule 701.37, “Meld.”
glossary.zh: 将一个融合牌组中的两张牌翻过来使其背面朝上并组合成一张大号万智牌卡牌。参见规则701.37，“融合”。

glossary.en: Cards with a Magic card face on one side and half of an oversized Magic card face on the other. See rule 712, “Double-Faced Cards.”
glossary.zh: 一种牌，一面具有万智牌的牌面，另一面是一张大号万智牌卡牌的一半。参见规则712，“双面牌”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that improves an attacking creature based on the number of opponents you attacked. See rule 702.121, “Melee.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，根据你攻击的对手数量来强化一个进攻生物。参见规则702.121，“乱斗”。

glossary.en: An evasion ability that makes creatures unblockable by a single creature. See rule 702.111, “Menace.”
glossary.zh: 一种躲避式异能，可以让生物不能被单一生物阻挡。参见规则702.111，“威慑”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets your bigger creatures power up your smaller creatures when they attack together. See rule 702.134, “Mentor.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使你的较大生物在与较小生物一同攻击时强化后者。参见规则702.134，“训导”。

glossary.en: A card or token may merge with a permanent to form a merged permanent. This merged permanent is represented by more than one card and/or token. See rule 727, “Merging with Permanents.”
glossary.zh: 牌或衍生物可能会与永久物结聚，组合成结聚永久物。这个结聚永久物会由多于一张的牌或衍生物所代表。参见规则727，“与永久物结聚”。

glossary.en: To mill a number of cards, a player puts that many cards from the top of their library into their graveyard. See rule 701.13.
glossary.zh: 磨数张牌指，牌手将该数量的牌从牌库顶置于其坟墓场。参见规则701.13。

glossary.en: If a rule or effect states that a player’s deck must contain at least a specific number of cards, that number is the player’s minimum deck size.
glossary.zh: 如果一个规则或效应叙述牌手的套牌必须至少包含一定数量的牌，该数量即为套牌张数下限。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets you cast a spell for a reduced cost if it’s the first card you draw in a turn. See rule 702.94, “Miracle.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，如果该牌是回合中你所抓的第一张牌，便允许你用较低的费用施放它。参见规则702.94，“奇迹”。

glossary.en: A spell or ability is “modal” if it has two or more options in a bulleted list preceded by instructions for a player to choose a number of those options, such as “Choose one —.” See rule 700.2.
glossary.zh: 如果某咒语或异能以项目列表的格式提供了两种或以上的选择，且以指示牌手从这些选项中选择数项的字样开头，例如“选择一项～”，此咒语或异能便具有模式。参见规则700.2。

glossary.en: One of two kinds of double-faced cards. Modal double-faced cards can be played with either of their two faces up and can’t transform. See rule 712, “Double-Faced Cards.”
glossary.zh: 两种双面牌中的一种。模式双面牌的两面可以任选一面朝上使用，但它不能转化。参见规则712，“双面牌”。

glossary.en: A modified creature is a creature that has a counter on it, is equipped, or is enchanted by an Aura its controller also controls. See rule 700.9.
glossary.zh: 有饰装的生物是指其上有指示物、或佩带有武具、或被一个由其操控者操控的灵气所结附的生物。参见规则700.9。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that has a permanent enter the battlefield with +1/+1 counters on it and can move those counters to other artifact creatures. See rule 702.43, “Modular.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使得永久物进战场时带有+1/+1指示物，且能将这些指示物移动到其他神器生物上。参见规则702.43，“套件”。

glossary.en: A designation a player can have. Some effects instruct a player to become the monarch. The monarch draws a card at the beginning of their end step. Dealing combat damage to the monarch steals the title from that player. See rule 722, “The Monarch.”
glossary.zh: 牌手能获得的一种称号。一些效应使牌手成为君主。君主在其结束步骤开始时抓一张牌。对君主造成战斗伤害可以从该牌手上夺取该称号。参见规则722，“君主”。

glossary.en: An obsolete term that appeared on the type line of artifacts with activated abilities that caused the artifact to become tapped as a cost. Cards printed with this text have received errata in the Oracle card reference to simply say “Artifact,” and those abilities now include the tap symbol in their costs.
glossary.zh: 一个已废止的用词，出现在神器的类别栏中。它代表神器具有起动式异能，且起动式异能的费用是将其横置。具有此用词的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到勘误，现在它们的类别仅为“神器”，且其异能的费用中包含横置符号。

glossary.en: An object with exactly one color is monocolored. Colorless objects aren’t monocolored. See rule 105, “Colors,” and rule 202, “Mana Cost and Color.”
glossary.zh: 有且只有一种颜色的物件是单色。无色物件不是单色。参见规则105，“颜色”，和规则202，“法术力费用和颜色”。

glossary.en: See Hybrid Mana Symbols.
glossary.zh: 参见混血法术力符号。

glossary.en: A keyword action that puts +1/+1 counters on a creature and makes it become monstrous. See rule 701.31, “Monstrosity.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，在生物上放置+1/+1指示物，并使其成为蛮化。（译注：中文版翻译中，“当...成为蛮化时”简略译为“当...蛮化时”，有可能引起混淆。）参见规则701.31，“蛮化”。

glossary.en: A designation given to a creature whose ability including a monstrosity instruction has resolved. See rule 701.31, “Monstrosity.”
glossary.zh: 因一个生物的蛮化起动式异能已经结算，而赋予它的一种称号。（译注：中文版翻译中，“当...成为蛮化时”简略译为“当...蛮化时”，有可能引起混淆。）参见规则701.31，“蛮化”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows some cards to be cast converted. See rule 702.162, “More Than Meets the Eye,” and rule 701.50, “Convert.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使你可以已转换地施放某些牌。参见规则702.162，“远超所见”，及规则701.50，“转换”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a card be cast face down as a 2/2 creature. See rule 702.37, “Morph,” and rule 708, “Face-Down Spells and Permanents.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许该牌以牌面朝下的方式，且视为2/2生物一般施放。参见规则702.37，“变身”，和规则708，“牌面朝下的咒语和永久物”。

glossary.en: One of the five basic land types. Any land with this subtype has the ability “{T}: Add {R}.” See rule 305.6.
glossary.zh: 五种基本地类别中的一种。任何具有此副类别的地都具有异能“{T}：加{R}。”参见规则305.6。

glossary.en: See Typecycling.
glossary.zh: 参见类别循环。

glossary.en: See Landwalk.
glossary.zh: 参见地行者。

glossary.en:
To remove a counter from one object and put it on a different object. See rule 122.5.
Some older cards used “move” with respect to Auras; those cards have received errata in the Oracle card reference and now use the word “attach.”
glossary.zh:
从一个物件上移除指示物，并将其放置在另一个物件上。参见规则122.5。
一些较老的牌使用“移动”一词提及灵气；这些牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已获得勘误，现在使用“贴附”一词。

glossary.en: To take a mulligan is to reject a prospective opening hand in favor of a new one. See rule 103.5.
glossary.zh: 执行“再调度”是指不接受一副可能的起手牌，并用一副新的起手牌代替之。参见规则103.5。

glossary.en: An object with two or more colors is multicolored. Multicolored is not a color. See rule 105, “Colors,” and rule 202, “Mana Cost and Color.”
glossary.zh: 具有两个或更多颜色的物件便是多色。多色并不是一种颜色。参见规则105，“颜色”，和规则202，“法术力费用和颜色”。

glossary.en: Multikicker is a variant of the kicker keyword ability. It represents an optional additional cost that may be paid any number of times. See rule 702.33, “Kicker.” See also Kicker.
glossary.zh: 多重增幅是增幅关键字异能的变化形式。它代表一种可以支付任意次的可选额外费用。参见规则702.33，“增幅”。另参见增幅。

glossary.en: A game that begins with more than two players. See section 8, “Multiplayer Rules.”
glossary.zh: 开始时多于两人参与的游戏。参见第8章，“多人游戏规则”。

glossary.en: A keyword that lets a creature card be cast as a mutating creature spell. See rule 702.140, “Mutate.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字，使得生物可以作为合变式生物咒语施放。参见规则702.140，“合变”。

glossary.en: A creature spell cast using the mutate keyword ability. As it resolves, if its target creature is legal, it merges with the target creature. The resulting creature has all characteristics of the topmost component and has the abilities of each component. See rule 702.140, “Mutate,” and rule 727, “Merging with Permanents.”
glossary.zh: 一个使用合变关键字异能施放的生物咒语。于其结算时，如果其目标的生物合法，其与该目标生物结聚。所成的生物具有最顶上组件的所有特征以及每个组件的异能。参见规则702.140，“合变”，以及规则727，“与永久物结聚”。

glossary.en: Myriad is a triggered ability that effectively lets a creature attack in all possible directions. See rule 702.116, “Myriad.”
glossary.zh: 一个触发式异能，能使生物向所有可能的方向攻击。参见规则702.116，“繁影”。

glossary.en: A characteristic, and part of a card. A card’s name is printed in its upper left corner. See rule 201, “Name.”
glossary.zh: 一个特征，也是牌的一部分。牌的名称印在它的左上角。参见规则201，“名称”。

glossary.en: Along with day, a designation the game can have. See rule 728, “Day and Night,” and rule 702.145, “Daybound and Nightbound.”
glossary.zh: 与白昼一起，均是游戏可以具有的称号。参见规则728，“白昼与黑夜”，与规则702.145，“昼形与夜形”。

glossary.en: An ability found on the back faces of some double-faced cards. Cards with daybound and nightbound are face up when it’s day and face down when it’s night. See rule 702.145, “Daybound and Nightbound,” and rule 728, “Day and Night.”
glossary.zh: 一种异能，见于一些双面牌的背面上。具昼形与夜形异能的牌，在白昼时正面朝上，在黑夜时背面朝上。参见规则702.145，“昼形与夜形”，与规则728，“白昼与黑夜”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a creature suddenly enter combat. See rule 702.49, “Ninjutsu.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物突然加入战斗。参见规则702.49，“忍术”。

glossary.en: Any land that doesn’t have the supertype “basic.” See rule 205.4, “Supertypes.”
glossary.zh: 任何不具有超类别“基本”的地。参见规则205.4，“超类别”。

glossary.en: A card not included in players’ decks. It may be oversized or have a card back other than a “Deckmaster” back. See rule 108.2.
glossary.zh: 不包含在牌手套牌中的一种牌。它们可能是大号尺寸，或具有不为“Deckmaster”的背面。参见规则108.2。

glossary.en: An ability on the stack, a card, a copy of a card, an emblem, a token, a spell, or a permanent. See rule 109, “Objects.”
glossary.zh: 堆叠上的异能、牌、牌的复制、衍生物、咒语或永久物。参见规则109，“物件”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that modifies when you can cast a spell and how much mana you need to spend to do it. See rule 702.48, “Offering.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，影响你何时施放咒语以及所需要花费的法术力数量。参见规则702.48，“献祭”。

glossary.en: An effect that does something just once and doesn’t have a duration. See rule 610, “One-Shot Effects.” See also Continuous Effects.
glossary.zh: 只作一件事且没有持续的效应。参见规则610，“一次性效应”。另参见持续性效应。

glossary.en: A supertype that appears only on scheme cards. See rule 205.4, “Supertypes.”
glossary.zh: 只出现在阴谋牌上的超类别。参见规则205.4，“超类别”。

glossary.en: The hand of cards a player starts the game with, once the player has decided not to take any further mulligans. See rule 103.5.
glossary.zh: 在牌手决定不再调度之后，其开始游戏时手上的牌。参见规则103.5。

glossary.en: Someone a player is playing against. See rules 102.2 and 102.3.
glossary.zh: 牌手正在对局的人。参见规则102.2和102.3。

glossary.en: An additional rule or set of rules that can be used in a multiplayer game. See rule 800.2.
glossary.zh: 多人游戏中可以使用的一些额外规则。参见规则800.2。

glossary.en: The reference that contains the up-to-date wordings (in English) for all tournament-legal cards. A card’s Oracle text can be found using the Gatherer card database at Gatherer.Wizards.com. See rule 108.1.
glossary.zh: 牌张参考文献，包括所有比赛中合法使用牌的最新叙述（英文）。牌的Oracle叙述可以在Gatherer牌张数据库中找到：Gatherer.Wizards.com。参见规则108.1。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows a creature to grow larger over time. See rule 702.107, “Outlast.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物能够持续变大。参见规则702.107，“延生”。

glossary.en: An object is “outside the game” if it isn’t in any of the game’s zones. See rule 400.11.
glossary.zh: 如果一个物件不在任何游戏区域中，该物件在“游戏之外”。参见规则400.11。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows a spell to affect either a single target or many objects. See rule 702.96, “Overload.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让一个咒语影响一个目标或多个物件。参见规则702.96，“超载”。

glossary.en: The player who (for purposes of the game) a card, permanent, token, or spell belongs to. See rules 108.3, 110.2, 111.2, and 112.2.
glossary.zh: （作为游戏的一部分）拥有一张牌、永久物、衍生物或咒语的牌手。参见规则108.3、110.2、111.2和112.2。

glossary.en: A term that describes a creature that’s been affected by a soulbond ability. See rule 702.95, “Soulbond.”
glossary.zh: 一个描述受魂系异能影响之生物的用词。参见规则702.95，“魂系”。

glossary.en: Informal term for a previous system of taking a mulligan. Using the Paris mulligan, a player who took a mulligan shuffled their hand into their library and drew one fewer card. For current mulligan rules, see rule 103.5.
glossary.zh: 指代一种曾经的再调度方式的非正式用词。使用巴黎再调度方式时，牌手再调度时将其手牌洗入其牌库，然后少抓一张牌。要查看当前的再调度规则，参见规则103.5。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets two legendary creatures or planeswalkers be your commander in the Commander variant rather than one. “Partner with [name]” is a specialized version of the ability that works even outside of the Commander variant to help two cards reach the battlefield together. See rule 702.124, “Partner,” and rule 903, “Commander.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，在指挥官玩法中使两个传奇生物（而不是一个）成为你的指挥官。“与[名称]拍档”是此异能的特别形式，它即使在指挥官玩法之外也能起作用，能帮助两张牌同时抵达战场。参见规则702.124，“拍档”以及规则903，“指挥官”。

glossary.en: Some cards refer to the number of creatures in your party. A player’s party includes up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard. See rule 700.8.
glossary.zh: 一些牌提及你冒险团中的生物数量。牌手的冒险团由僧侣、浪客、战士和法术师组成，每种类别至多只计入一个。参见规则700.8。

glossary.en: To decline to take any action (such as casting a spell or activating an ability) when you have priority. See rule 117, “Timing and Priority.”
glossary.zh: 在拥有优先权时不执行动作（例如施放咒语或起动异能）。参见规则117，“时机和优先权”。

glossary.en: All players “pass in succession” if each player in the game (starting with any one of them) opts not to take an action upon receiving priority. See rule 117, “Timing and Priority.”
glossary.zh: 如果游戏中的每位牌手（从任意一人开始）在得到优先权时都不执行动作，所有牌手便“依次让过”。参见规则117，“时机和优先权”。

glossary.en: To perform the actions required by a cost. This often means, but is not restricted to, spending resources such as mana or life. See rule 118, “Costs.”
glossary.zh: 当游戏产生费用要求时，执行满足要求的动作。这通常意味着，但不限于，花费法术力或生命等资源。参见规则118，“费用”。

glossary.en: A card or token on the battlefield. See rule 110, “Permanents.”
glossary.zh: 战场上的牌或衍生物。参见规则110，“永久物”。

glossary.en: A card that could be put onto the battlefield. See rule 110.4a.
glossary.zh: 可以放进战场的牌。参见规则110.4a。

glossary.en: A spell that will enter the battlefield as a permanent as part of its resolution. See rule 110.4b.
glossary.zh: 结算时会作为永久物进入战场的咒语。参见规则110.4b。

glossary.en: An obsolete term used to indicate that a continuous effect has no duration and thus lasts until the end of the game. Cards printed with this term have received errata in the Oracle card reference to delete it.
glossary.zh: 一个已废止的用词，指示一个持续性效应没有时限，并延续直到此盘游戏结束。具有此用词的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已获得勘误，并删去此用词。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that can return a creature from the graveyard to the battlefield. See rule 702.79, “Persist.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，可以将生物从坟场返回战场。参见规则702.79，“留存”。

glossary.zhname: 阶段/时间跳跃（译者注：这两个词在英文原文中相同）
glossary.en:
1. A subsection of a turn. See section 5, “Turn Structure.”
2. A permanent “phases in” when its status changes from phased out to phased in. A permanent “phases out” when its status changes from phased in to phased out. See rule 702.26, “Phasing.”
glossary.zh:
1. 组成回合的一部分。参见第5章，“回合结构”。
2. 当永久物的状态从已跃离变为已跃回时，该永久物“跃回”。当永久物的状态从已跃回变为已跃离时，该永久物“跃离”。参见规则702.26，“时间跳跃”。

glossary.en: A status a permanent may have. Phased-in is the default status. Phased-out permanents are treated as though they do not exist. See rule 110.5 and rule 702.26, “Phasing.” (“Phased-out” was a zone in older versions of the rules.)
glossary.zh: 永久物可能具有的状态。默认状态下，永久物都是已跃回。已跃离的永久物被视为其不存在。参见规则110.5和规则702.26，“时间跳跃”。（“跃离区”在较老版本的规则中是一个游戏区域。）

glossary.en: A keyword ability that causes a permanent to sometimes be treated as though it does not exist. See rule 702.26, “Phasing.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使得永久物有时被视为其不存在。参见规则702.26，“时间跳跃”。

glossary.en: A card type seen only on nontraditional Magic cards in the Planechase casual variant. A phenomenon card is not a permanent. See rule 312, “Phenomena.”
glossary.zh: 只出现在非传统万智牌上的一种牌类别，在竞逐时空休闲式玩法中使用。参见规则312，“异象”。

glossary.zhname: 非瑞克西亚法术力符号
glossary.en: A mana symbol that represents a cost that can be paid either by spending colored mana or by paying life. See rule 107.4.
glossary.zh: 一种法术力符号，表示其既可以使用有色法术力支付，也可以使用生命支付。参见规则107.4。

glossary.en: A symbol used in rules text to represent any of the five Phyrexian mana symbols. See rule 107.4g.
glossary.zh: 规则叙述中使用的一种符号，代表五种非瑞克西亚法术力符号中的任何一种。参见规则107.4g。

glossary.en: A temporary grouping of cards. See rule 700.3.
glossary.zh: 牌的临时分组方式。参见规则700.3。

glossary.zhname: 放置（译注：place和put中文都译为放置，此词已废止仅因为英文统一了词汇。）
glossary.en: (Obsolete) Some spells and abilities previously referred to a counter being “placed” on a permanent. These cards have received errata in the Oracle card reference to use the term “put” instead. Due to a rules change, these cards continue to function as they did before. See rule 122, “Counters.”
glossary.zh: （已废止）一些咒语和异能先前提及指示物“被放置(placed)”在永久物上。这些牌张在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到勘误，现使用“放置(put)”一词。由于规则变动，这些牌张仍能如往常一般地正常运作。参见规则122，“指示物”。

glossary.en: One of the five basic land types. Any land with this subtype has the ability “{T}: Add {W}.” See rule 305.6.
glossary.zh: 五种基本地类别中的一种。任何具有此副类别的地都具有异能“{T}：加{W}。”参见规则305.6。

glossary.en: See Typecycling.
glossary.zh: 参见类别循环。

glossary.en: See Landwalk.
glossary.zh: 参见地行者。

glossary.en: A deck of at least ten plane cards needed to play the Planechase casual variant. See rule 901.3.
glossary.zh: 竞逐时空休闲式玩法需要的至少十张时空牌组成的套牌。参见规则901.3。

glossary.en: A specialized six-sided die needed to play the Planechase casual variant. See rule 901.3.
glossary.zh: 竞逐时空休闲式玩法需要的特制六面骰。参见规则901.3。

glossary.en: A card type seen only on nontraditional Magic cards in the Planechase casual variant. A plane card is not a permanent. See rule 311, “Planes.”
glossary.zh: 一种牌类别，只在竞逐时空休闲式玩法中使用的非传统万智牌上出现。时空牌不是永久物。参见规则311，“时空”。

glossary.en: A casual variant in which plane cards and phenomenon cards add additional abilities and randomness to the game. See rule 901, “Planechase.”
glossary.zh: 一种休闲式玩法，时空牌和异象牌为游戏带来额外的异能和随机性。参见规则901，“竞逐时空”。

glossary.en: To put each face-up plane card or phenomenon card on the bottom of its owner’s planar deck face down, then move the top card of your planar deck off that planar deck and turn it face up in a Planechase game. See rule 701.24, “Planeswalk.”
glossary.zh: 在竞逐时空游戏中，将每张面朝上的时空牌或异象牌面朝下置于其拥有者的时空套牌底，然后将你的时空套牌顶牌移离该时空套牌并将其翻回正面。参见规则701.24，“时空换境”。

glossary.en: A card type. A planeswalker is a permanent. See rule 306, “Planeswalkers.”
glossary.zh: 一种牌类别。鹏洛客是永久物。参见规则306，“鹏洛客”。

glossary.en: The Planeswalker symbol appears on the planar die in the Planechase casual variant. See rule 107.11.
glossary.zh: 鹏洛客符号出现在竞逐时空休闲式玩法中使用的时空骰上。参见规则107.11。

glossary.en: A subtype that’s correlated to the planeswalker card type. See rule 306, “Planeswalkers.” See rule 205.3j for the list of planeswalker types.
glossary.zh: 与鹏洛客牌类别相关的副类别。参见规则306，“鹏洛客”。参见规则205.3j查看鹏洛客类别的列表。

glossary.zhname: 鹏洛客唯一规则（已废止）
glossary.en: Older versions of the rules stated that a player who controlled two or more planeswalkers with the same planeswalker type would put all but one of those planeswalkers into their owners’ graveyards. This rule was called the “planeswalker uniqueness rule” and no longer exists.
glossary.zh: 先前版本的规则叙述牌手操控两个或更多具有相同鹏洛客类别的鹏洛客时，除留下其中之一外，其余均置于其拥有者的坟墓场。此规则曾称为“鹏洛客唯一规则”，现已不复存在。

glossary.zhname: 使用/场上（译者注：这两个词在英文原文中相同）
glossary.en:
1. To play a land is to put a land onto the battlefield as a special action. See rule 116, “Special Actions,” and rule 305, “Lands.”
2. To play a card is to play that card as a land or cast that card as a spell, whichever is appropriate. See rule 601, “Casting Spells.”
3. (Obsolete) Casting a spell used to be known as playing a spell. Cards with that text have received errata in the Oracle card reference. See Cast.
4. (Obsolete) Activating an activated ability used to be known as playing an activated ability. Cards with that text have received errata in the Oracle card reference. See Activate.
5. (Obsolete) The battlefield used to be known as the in-play zone. Cards that were printed with text that contains the phrases “in play,” “from play,” “into play,” or the like are referring to the battlefield and have received errata in the Oracle card reference. See Battlefield.
glossary.zh:
1. 使用一张地是指将一张地作为特殊动作放进战场。参见规则116，“特殊动作”，和规则305，“地”。
2. 使用一张牌是指使用地或施放咒语，依该牌的类别而定。参见规则601，“施放咒语”。
3. （已废止）施放咒语曾经称为使用咒语。具有该用词的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已获得勘误。参见施放。
4. （已废止）起动起动式异能曾经称为使用起动式异能。具有该用词的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已获得勘误。参见起动。
5. （已废止）战场曾经称为场上区。具有用词“场上”、“从场上”、“进场”等提及战场的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已获得勘误。参见战场。

glossary.en: One of the people in the game. See rule 102, “Players.”
glossary.zh: 游戏中的人之一。参见规则102，“牌手”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player exile cards from their hand and cast them without paying their mana cost on future turns. See rule 702.170, “Plot.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许牌手从手上放逐牌并在之后的回合中施放，且不需支付其法术力费用。参见规则702.170，“设谋”。

glossary.en: A card exiled using the plot special action becomes plotted. Other effects can also make an exiled card plotted. See rule 702.170, “Plot.”
glossary.zh: 以设谋特殊动作放逐的牌成为已设谋。其他效应亦能令一张已放逐的牌成为已设谋。参见规则702.170，“设谋”。

glossary.en: A counter that may be given to a player. See rule 122, “Counters,” and rule 704.5c.
glossary.zh: 可以给予牌手的一种指示物。参见规则122，“指示物”，和规则704.5c。

glossary.en: Having one or more poison counters. See rule 122, “Counters.”
glossary.zh: 具有一个或数个中毒指示物。参见规则122，“指示物”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that causes a player to get poison counters. See rule 702.70, “Poisonous.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使牌手获得中毒指示物。参见规则702.70，“剧毒”。

glossary.en: An obsolete term that appeared on the type line of artifacts with activated abilities that didn’t cause the artifact to be tapped as a cost. Cards printed with this text have received errata in the Oracle card reference to simply say “Artifact.”
glossary.zh: 一个已废止的用词，出现在神器的类别栏中。它代表神器具有起动式异能，且起动式异能的费用不包含将其横置。具有此用词的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到勘误，现在它们的类别仅为“神器”。

glossary.en: A keyword action that creates a copy of a creature token you control. See rule 701.30, “Populate.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，派出由你操控的衍生生物之复制。参见规则701.30，“殖民”。

glossary.en: A main phase that occurs after a combat phase. See Main Phase.
glossary.zh: 战斗阶段之后的行动阶段。参见行动阶段。

glossary.en:
1. Part of a card that only creature cards have. A creature card’s power is printed before the slash in its lower right corner. See rule 208, “Power/Toughness.”
2. A characteristic that only creatures have. See rule 302.4.
glossary.zh:
