1. 只有生物牌具有的牌的一部分。生物牌的力量印在其右下角斜线之前。参见规则208，“力量/防御力”。
2. 一个只有生物才具有的特征。参见规则302.4。

glossary.en: A Powerstone token is a colorless artifact token with “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.” For more information about predefined tokens, see rule 111.10.
glossary.zh: 魔力石衍生物是具有“{T}：加{C}。此法术力不能用来施放非神器咒语。”的无色魔力石衍生神器。欲知关于预定义衍生物的更多信息，参见规则111.10。

glossary.en: The first main phase of a turn. See Main Phase.
glossary.zh: 回合中的第一个行动阶段。参见行动阶段。

glossary.en: A word used by prevention effects to indicate what damage will not be dealt. See rule 615, “Prevention Effects.”
glossary.zh: 一个出现在防止性效应中的用词，指示哪些伤害不会造成。参见规则615，“防止性效应”。

glossary.en: A kind of continuous effect that watches for a damage event that would happen and completely or partially prevents the damage that would be dealt. See rule 615, “Prevention Effects.”
glossary.zh: 一类持续性效应，等待将要发生的伤害事件，并完全或部分地防止将要造成的伤害。参见规则615，“防止性效应”。

glossary.en: Which player can take actions at any given time is determined by a system of “priority.” See rule 117, “Timing and Priority.”
glossary.zh: 使用“优先权”系统来决定任一时刻哪位牌手可以执行动作。参见规则117，“时机和优先权”。

glossary.en: An additional reward for visiting some Attractions. See rule 702.159, “Visit.”
glossary.zh: 造访一些景点带来的额外好处。参见规则702.159，“造访”。

glossary.en: To give an additional counter to any number of players and/or permanents of each kind they already have. See rule 701.27, “Proliferate.”
glossary.zh: 对于任意数量的已有指示物的牌手和/或永久物，其上每种指示物都给予一个额外的指示物。参见规则701.27，“增殖”。

glossary.en: Each battle has a player designated as its protector, and that player protects that battle. See rule 310.8.
glossary.zh: 每个战役都需要指定一位牌手作为防卫者，该牌手防卫该战役。参见规则310.8。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that provides a range of benefits against objects with a specific quality. See rule 702.16, “Protection.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，具此异能者免受具指定特性之物件的一系列影响。参见规则702.16，“保护”。

glossary.en: An ability which allows a prototype card to be cast with a secondary set of characteristics. See rule 718, “Prototype Cards,” and rule 702.160, “Prototype.”
glossary.zh: 一个异能，允许一张试作牌使用其第二组特征来施放。参见规则718，“试作牌”，及规则702.160，“试作”。

glossary.en: Cards with a two-part card frame (one part of which is inset under the type line) on a single card. See rule 718, “Prototype Cards.”
glossary.zh: 一张分为两部分（且其中一部分是嵌在类别栏下方）的牌。参见规则718，“试作牌”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that can force a creature to block. See rule 702.39, “Provoke.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，当生物的操控者施放非生物咒语时，使该生物得+1/+1。参见规则702.108，“灵技”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that causes a creature to get +1/+1 whenever its controller casts a noncreature spell. See rule 702.108, “Prowess.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，可以迫使生物进行阻挡。参见规则702.39，“挑拨”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that may allow a spell to be cast for an alternative cost. See rule 702.76, “Prowl.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，有时允许咒语以替代性费用施放。参见规则702.76，“伺机”。

glossary.en: A zone in which all players can be expected to see the cards’ faces. See rule 400.2. See also Hidden Zone.
glossary.zh: 所有牌手都可以看到其中牌面的区域。参见规则400.2。另参见隐藏区域。

glossary.en: A type of counter a player can have that causes that player to mill cards at the beginning of their precombat main phase, then lose 1 life and remove one rad counter for each nonland card milled this way. See rule 122, “Counters,” and rule 725, “Rad Counters.”
glossary.zh: 牌手可以具有的一种指示物，会导致牌手在其战斗前的行动阶段磨牌，然后每以此法磨掉一张非地牌，便失去1点生命并移去一个拉德指示物。参见规则122，“指示物”，及规则725，“拉德指示物”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that can make a creature better in combat. See rule 702.23, “Rampage.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物在战斗中更强。参见规则702.23，“狂暴”。

glossary.en: See Limited Range of Influence.
glossary.zh: 参见限制影响范围。

glossary.en: A keyword ability found on some creature cards with {X} in their mana cost. The creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, and you draw a card if X is 5 or more. See rule 702.156, “Ravenous.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，见于一些法术力费用中含有{X}的生物牌上。该生物进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，且如果X等于或大于5，你抓一张牌。参见规则702.156，“贪食”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows a creature to block an attacking creature with flying. See rule 702.17, “Reach.” See also Flying.
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物可以阻挡具有飞行的攻击生物。参见规则702.17，“延势”。另参见飞行。

glossary.en: A keyword ability found on some Sagas that allows their controller to choose which chapter it starts on. See rule 702.155, “Read Ahead.”
glossary.zh: 一个见于传纪上的关键字异能，允许其操控者选择从哪个章节开始。参见规则702.155，“跳读”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows an instant or sorcery spell to be cast a second time. See rule 702.88, “Rebound.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让瞬间或法术咒语可以被第二次施放。参见规则702.88，“弹回”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows an Equipment creature to temporarily stop being a creature and become attached to another creature. See rule 702.151, “Reconfigure.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让武具生物暂时不再是生物，且贴附于另一个生物上。参见规则702.151，“重配”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player return a card from their graveyard to their hand. See rule 702.59, “Recover.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手将某牌从其坟墓场中移回其手上。参见规则702.59，“复还”。

glossary.en: Some older cards were printed with the term “redirect” to indicate a redirection effect. Such cards have received errata in the Oracle card reference so they explicitly state that damage that would be dealt to one object or player is dealt “instead” to another. See Redirection Effect.
glossary.zh: 一些老牌印有“转移”一词，表示一个转移性效应。这些牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误，从而它们明确的说明对一个物件或牌手将造成的伤害“改为”对另一个造成。参见转移性效应。

glossary.en: A kind of replacement effect that causes damage that would be dealt to one creature, planeswalker, or player to be dealt instead to another creature, planeswalker, or player. See rule 614.9.
glossary.zh: 一种替代性效应，让对一个生物、鹏洛客、或牌手造成的伤害改为对另一个生物、鹏洛客、或牌手造成。参见规则614.9。

glossary.en: An ability that triggers based on actions taken earlier during a spell or ability’s resolution. See rule 603.12.
glossary.zh: 一种异能，根据先前咒语或异能结算过程中所作的动作而决定是否触发。参见规则603.12。

glossary.en: To replace a permanent’s destruction with an alternate sequence of events. See rule 701.15, “Regenerate.”
glossary.zh: 将一个永久物的消灭用另一系列事件进行替代。参见规则701.15，“重生”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player put +1/+1 counters on a creature. See rule 702.77, “Reinforce.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手在生物上放置+1/+1指示物。参见规则702.77，“补强”。

glossary.en: Parenthetical text in italics in the text box of a card that summarizes a rule that applies to that card, but is not actually rules text and has no effect on play. See rule 207.2.
glossary.zh: 牌的文字栏内括号中的斜体字，总结对该牌生效的一条规则，但不是正式规则叙述且对游戏没有效应。参见规则207.2。

glossary.en: Certain events can cause an attacking or blocking creature, or a planeswalker that’s being attacked, to be “removed from combat.” A permanent that’s removed from combat has no further involvement in that combat phase. See rule 506.4.
glossary.zh: 一些特定的事件将造成攻击或阻挡生物，或正被被攻击的鹏洛客，被“移出战斗”。一个被移出战斗的永久物对该战斗阶段没有更多的参与。参见规则506.4。

glossary.enname: Remove from the Game, Removed, Removed-from-the-Game Zone (Obsolete)
glossary.zhname: 移出游戏，移除，移出游戏区（已废止）
glossary.en: “Remove [something] from the game” is an obsolete term for “exile [something].” “The removed card” is an obsolete term for “the exiled card.” The removed-from-the-game zone is an obsolete term for the exile zone. Cards with that text have received errata in the Oracle card reference. See Exile.
glossary.zh: “将[某物]移出游戏”是对“放逐[某物]”已废止的用词。“被移除的牌”是对“被放逐的牌”已废止的用词。移出游戏区是对放逐区已废止的用词。具有这些叙述的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误。参见放逐。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that makes a creature stronger after it deals combat damage to a player. See rule 702.112, “Renown.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使生物对牌手造成过战斗伤害之后变得更强。参见规则702.112，“铭勇”。

glossary.en: A designation given to a permanent as a result of the renown ability. See rule 702.112, “Renown.”
glossary.zh: 因永久物的铭勇异能，而赋予它的一种称号。参见规则702.112，“铭勇”。

glossary.en: A kind of continuous effect that watches for a particular event that would happen and completely or partially replaces that event with a different event. See rule 614, “Replacement Effects.”
glossary.zh: 持续性效应的一种，注意某特定事件将发生，并且将该事件完全或部分的用不同的事件替代。参见规则614，“替代性效应”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that creates copies of a spell. See rule 702.56, “Replicate.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，创造咒语的复制。参见规则702.56，“覆诵”。

glossary.en: An effect that forces one or more creatures to attack or block. See rules 508.1d and 509.1c.
glossary.zh: 一个强制一个或数个生物攻击或阻挡的效应。参见规则508.1d以及509.1c。

glossary.en: When the spell or ability on top of the stack “resolves,” its instructions are followed and it has its effect. See rule 608, “Resolving Spells and Abilities.”
glossary.zh: 当堆叠顶端的咒语或异能“结算”时，它的叙述被执行且它具有其效应。参见规则608，“结算咒语和异能”。

glossary.en: To immediately end the current game and restart it. See rule 104, “Ending the Game.”
glossary.zh: 当前游戏马上结束并且重新开始。参见规则104，“结束游戏”。

glossary.en: To cast an instant spell or activate an ability while another spell or ability is already on the stack. See rule 117.7.
glossary.zh: 另一个咒语或异能已经在堆叠上时，施放一个瞬间咒语或起动一个异能。参见规则117.7。

glossary.en: An effect that precludes one or more creatures from attacking or blocking. See rules 508.1c and 509.1b.
glossary.zh: 一个阻止一个或数个生物攻击或阻挡的效应。参见规则508.1c以及509.1b。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player cast a card from their graveyard. See rule 702.81, “Retrace.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手从其坟墓场中施放牌。参见规则702.81，“追溯”。

glossary.en: To show a card to all players for a brief time. See rule 701.16, “Reveal.”
glossary.zh: 将一张牌在简短的事件内给所有牌手看。参见规则701.16，“展示”。

glossary.en: An emblem that may be created at the time the Ring tempts you. See rule 701.52, “The Ring Tempts You.”
glossary.zh: 一个徽记，在魔戒引诱你时被创造。参见规则701.52，“魔戒引诱你”。

glossary.en: A keyword action that causes a player to choose a creature they control to be their legendary Ring-bearer and may cause them to create an emblem called The Ring. See rule 701.52, “The Ring Tempts You.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，使牌手选择一个其操控的生物作为传奇持戒人，并创造一个名为魔戒的徽记。参见规则701.52，“魔戒引诱你”。

glossary.en: A designation that a creature can be given as the Ring tempts you. See rule 701.52, “The Ring Tempts You.”
glossary.zh: 一个永久物可在魔戒引诱你时得到的称号。参见规则701.52，“魔戒引诱你”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player choose whether certain creatures enter the battlefield with haste or with a +1/+1 counter. See rule 702.136, “Riot.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使牌手在某些生物进战场时选择其具有敏捷或是带有一个+1/+1指示物。参见规则702.136，“起事”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that may let a player cast extra cards from their library for no cost. See rule 702.60, “Ripple.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，可以让牌手从其牌库中施放额外的牌且不需支付费用。参见规则702.60，“涟动”。

glossary.en: Roles are colorless enchantment tokens. Each one has the Aura and Role subtypes and the enchant creature ability. If a permanent has more than one Role attached to it controlled by the same player, each of those Roles except the one with the most recent timestamp is put into its owner’s graveyard. See rule 303.7 and rules 111.10j–r.
glossary.zh: 角色是无色结界衍生物。每一种角色都具有灵气／角色的副类别，以及“结附于生物”的异能。如果某个永久物其上结附有由同一位牌手操控的数个角色，则除了具最近之时间印记者外，所有其他这类角色都会被置入其拥有者的坟墓场。参见规则303.7及规则111.10j-r。

glossary.en: To roll a twenty-sided die. Similarly, a d4 is a four-sided die, a d6 is a six-sided die, and so on. See rule 706, “Rolling a Die.”
glossary.zh: 掷一颗二十面的骰子。类似地，d4是四面的骰子，d6是六面的骰子，依此类推。参见规则706，“掷骰”。

glossary.en: A subsection of a dungeon card. See rule 309, “Dungeons.”
glossary.zh: 地城牌的一个分区。参见规则309，“地城”。

glossary.en: A triggered ability that triggers whenever a player moves their venture marker into a room of a dungeon card. See rule 309, “Dungeons.”
glossary.zh: 一个触发式异能，每当牌手将其进度标记移动到地城牌的一个房间中时触发。参见规则309，“地城”。

glossary.en: A characteristic that defines a card’s abilities. See rule 207.1.
glossary.zh: 定义牌异能的特征。参见规则207.1。

glossary.en: To move a permanent you control to its owner’s graveyard. See rule 701.17, “Sacrifice.”
glossary.zh: 将一个你操控的永久物移到其拥有者的坟墓场。参见规则701.17，“牺牲”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets you tap creatures to make another creature “saddled” until end of turn. See rule 702.171, “Saddle.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使你可以横置生物将另一个生物成为“已乘驾”直到回合结束。参见规则702.171，“乘驾”。

glossary.en: A designation given to a creature whose saddle ability has resolved. See rule 702.171, “Saddle.”
glossary.zh: 一个生物可在其乘驾异能结算时得到的称号。参见规则702.171，“乘驾”。

glossary.en: An enchantment subtype. Sagas have a number of chapter abilities that take effect over a number of turns to tell a story. See rule 714, “Saga Cards.”
glossary.zh: 一种结界的副类别。传纪具有一系列章节异能，以在数个回合的过程中生效的方式来讲述一段故事。参见规则714，“传纪牌”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows you to exile a creature card from your graveyard to put +1/+1 counters on a creature. See rule 702.97, “Scavenge.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让你可以从你的坟墓场中放逐一张生物牌来在一个生物上放置+1/+1指示物。参见规则702.97，“食腐”。

glossary.en: A card type seen only on nontraditional Magic cards in the Archenemy casual variant. A scheme card is not a permanent. See rule 314, “Schemes.”
glossary.zh: 一种牌类别，只在魔王休闲式玩法中使用的非传统万智牌上出现。阴谋牌不是永久物。参见规则314，“阴谋”。

glossary.en: A deck of at least twenty scheme cards needed to play the Archenemy casual variant. See rule 904.3.
glossary.zh: 魔王休闲式玩法需要的至少二十张阴谋牌组成的套牌。参见规则904.3。

glossary.en: To manipulate some of the cards on top of your library. See rule 701.18, “Scry.”
glossary.zh: 操纵你牌库顶的一些牌。参见规则701.18，“占卜”。

glossary.en: To look at all cards in a stated zone and possibly find a card that matches a given description. See rule 701.19, “Search.”
glossary.zh: 查看所描述区域中的所有牌，可能找到符合所述情况的牌。参见规则701.19，“搜寻”。

glossary.en: A smaller name line with the Oracle reference name of a card which has an alternate name in its upper left corner. See rule 201.6.
glossary.zh: 出现在左上角印有别名的牌上的一个较小的名称栏，包含其Oracle牌张参考文献中的名称。参见规则201.6。

glossary.en: “Set [something] aside” is an obsolete term for “exile [something].” Cards with that text have received errata in the Oracle card reference. See Exile.
glossary.zh: “将[物品]放在一边”是“放逐[物品]”的已废止用词。具有该叙述的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已得到勘误。参见放逐。

glossary.en: To move a scheme card off the top of your scheme deck and turn it face up. See rule 701.25, “Set in Motion.”
glossary.zh: 将你的阴谋套牌顶牌移离并将其翻回正面。参见规则701.25，“实施”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that restricts how a creature may be blocked and which creatures it can block. See rule 702.28, “Shadow.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，限制生物可以如何被阻挡和可以如何阻挡。参见规则702.28，“次元幽影”。

glossary.en: A Shard token is a colorless enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Scry 1, then draw a card.” For more information on predefined tokens, see rule 111.10.
glossary.zh: 碎片衍生物是具有“{2}，牺牲此结界：占卜1，然后抓一张牌”的无色衍生结界。欲知关于预定义衍生物的更多信息，参见规则111.10。

glossary.en: In the Two-Headed Giant multiplayer variant, each team has a “shared life total” rather than each player having an individual life total. See rule 810, “Two-Headed Giant Variant.”
glossary.zh: 在双头巨人多人玩法中，每个队伍具有“共享生命总值”而不是每位牌手有单独的生命总值。参见规则810，“双头巨人玩法”。

glossary.en: An option that may be used in certain multiplayer variants, such as Two-Headed Giant and Archenemy. See rule 805, “Shared Team Turns Option.”
glossary.zh: 在某些特殊多人玩法中可以使用的模式，比如双头巨人和魔王。参见规则805，“队伍共享回合模式”。

glossary.en: A counter that protects a permanent from being damaged or destroyed. See rule 122.1c.
glossary.zh: 一种指示物，保护永久物不受伤害、不被消灭。参见规则122.1c。

glossary.en: A mutually understood way for the game to advance forward a number of game choices (either taking an action or passing priority) without players needing to explicitly identify each such choice. See rule 729, “Taking Shortcuts.”
glossary.zh: 在无须双方牌手特别指出每个选择的情况下，让大家自然可以理解并让游戏自然通过这些游戏选择（作出动作或让过优先权）。参见规则729，“进行简化”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that precludes a permanent or player from being targeted. See rule 702.18, “Shroud.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让永久物或牌手避免成为目标。参见规则702.18，“帷幕”。

glossary.en: To randomize the cards in a deck (before a game) or library (during a game). See rule 103.3 and rule 701.20.
glossary.zh: 将套牌（游戏开始前）或牌库（游戏过程中）中的牌随机化。参见规则103.3及规则701.20。

glossary.en: Extra cards that may be used to modify a deck between games of a match. See rules 100.4.
glossary.zh: 在一局比赛的两盘之间可以更改套牌的额外的牌。参见规则100.4。

glossary.en: A battle subtype. Only an opponent of a Siege’s controller can be its protector. When the last defense counter is removed, its controller exiles the Siege, then they may cast it transformed without paying its mana cost. See rule 310.11.
glossary.zh: 一个战役类别。只有围攻的操控者之对手可以作为其防卫者。当移去最后一个布防指示物时，其操控者将它放逐，然后可以施放已转化的此牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。参见规则310.11。

glossary.en: Cards in certain sets and certain promotional cards are printed with a silver border. Silver-bordered cards are intended for casual play and may have features and text that aren’t covered by these rules.
glossary.zh: 一些系列中的卡牌和一些赠卡以银色边框印刷。银边牌张用于休闲游戏，可能具有本文件中之规则未涵盖的特性及叙述。

glossary.en: Effects that use the word “skip” are replacement effects. The word “skip” indicates what events, steps, phases, or turns will be replaced with nothing. See rule 614, “Replacement Effects.”
glossary.zh: 使用“略过”一词的效应为替代性效应。“略过”一词表示哪个事件、步骤、阶段或回合将被什么都不发生替代。参见规则614，“替代性效应”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that restricts how a creature may be blocked. See rule 702.118, “Skulk.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，限制一个生物能够如何被阻挡。参见规则702.118，“潜匿”。

glossary.en: See Typecycling.
glossary.zh: 参见类别循环。

glossary.en: A supertype that’s normally relevant on permanents. See rule 205.4, “Supertypes.”
glossary.zh: 一般只对永久物有关的超类别。参见规则205.4，“超类别”。

glossary.en: The snow mana symbol {S} represents a cost that can be paid with one mana produced by a snow source. It can also represent mana from a snow source that was spent to pay a cost. See rule 107.4h.
glossary.zh: 雪境法术力符号{S}表示一点可以由雪境来源所产生的法术力所支付的费用。它也可以表示用于支付费用的、由雪境来源所产生的法术力。参见规则107.4h。

glossary.en: Some older cards were printed with the term “snow-covered” in their rules text. Except when referencing card names, such cards have received errata in the Oracle card reference to reference the supertype “snow” instead. See Snow.
glossary.zh: 一些老牌在规则叙述中印有“冰雪覆盖”一词。除非特指牌名，否则这些牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已得到勘误改为特指具有超类别“雪境”。参见雪境。

glossary.en:
1. A designation a Case may have, allowing its last ability to affect the game. See rule 719, “Case Cards.”
2. A keyword ability of Case cards that affects the game only if the Case has the solved designation. See rule 702.169, “Solved.”
glossary.zh:
1. 一个案件可以获得的称号，允许案件的最后一个异能影响游戏。参见规则719，“案件牌”。
2. 一个案件的关键字异能，在案件具有已侦结此称号时影响游戏。参见规则702.169，“侦结”。

glossary.en: A card type. A sorcery is not a permanent. See rule 307, “Sorceries.”
glossary.zh: 一个牌类别。法术不是永久物。参见规则307，“法术”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that makes creatures better by pairing them together. See rule 702.95, “Soulbond.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物组成搭档时更强。参见规则702.95，“魂系”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player return a card from their graveyard to their hand. See rule 702.46, “Soulshift.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手将其坟墓场中的牌移回其手上。参见规则702.46，“转生”。

glossary.en: The object that generated that ability. See rule 113.7.
glossary.zh: 创造该异能的物件。参见规则113.7。

glossary.en: The object that dealt that damage. See rule 609.7.
glossary.zh: 造成伤害的物件。参见规则609.7。

glossary.en: The spell that produced mana or the source of the ability that produced mana. See rule 106.3.
glossary.zh: 产生该法术力的咒语，或产生该法术力的异能之来源。参见规则106.3。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that splits creatures on the battlefield into sectors. See rule 702.158, “Space Sculptor.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，将战场上的生物分为不同星区。参见规则702.158，“Space Sculptor”。

glossary.en: An action a player may take that doesn’t use the stack. See rule 116, “Special Actions.”
glossary.zh: 牌手可以进行且不使用堆叠的动作。参见规则116，“特殊动作”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows certain spells to be cast for an alternative cost if an opponent has lost life. See rule 702.137, “Spectacle.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，在对手失去生命后允许一些咒语以替代性费用施放。参见规则702.137，“揭幕”。

glossary.en: A card on the stack. Also a copy (of either a card or another spell) on the stack. See rule 112, “Spells.”
glossary.zh: 堆叠上的牌。以及堆叠上（无论是牌还是另一个咒语）的复制。参见规则112，“咒语”。

glossary.en: A kind of ability. Spell abilities are abilities that are followed as instructions while an instant or sorcery spell is resolving. See rule 113.3a.
glossary.zh: 异能的一种。咒语异能为在瞬间或法术咒语结算时其叙述所表达的异能。参见规则113.3a。

glossary.en: A subtype that’s correlated to the instant card type and the sorcery card type. See rule 304, “Instants,” and rule 307, “Sorceries.” See rule 205.3k for the list of spell types.
glossary.zh: 和瞬间牌类别和法术牌类别对应的副类别。参见规则304，“瞬间”，以及规则307，“法术”。参见规则205.3k的咒语类别列表。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player add a card’s rules text onto another spell. See rule 702.47, “Splice.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手将牌的规则叙述附加到另一个咒语上。参见规则702.47，“通联”。

glossary.en: Cards with two card faces on a single card. See rule 709, “Split Cards.”
glossary.zh: 在一张牌上有两张牌面。参见规则709，“连体牌”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that makes it nearly impossible for a player to respond to a spell. See rule 702.61, “Split Second.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手几乎无法响应一个咒语。参见规则702.61，“转瞬”。

glossary.en: An ability found on some modal spells that allows you to choose one or more modes and requires you to pay additional costs for those modes. See rule 702.172, “Spree.”
glossary.zh: 一个见于某些具有模式之咒语上的关键字，允许你选择一个或数个模式，并需要为这些模式支付额外费用。参见规则702.172，“追欢”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that creates copies of a creature when it enters the battlefield. See rule 702.157, “Squad.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使生物进战场时派出其复制品。参见规则702.157，“小队”。

glossary.en: A zone. The stack is the zone in which spells, activated abilities, and triggered abilities wait to resolve. See rule 405, “Stack.”
glossary.zh: 一个区域。堆叠是让咒语、起动式异能、和触发式异能等待结算的区域。参见规则405，“堆叠”。

glossary.en: After a player has set aside their sideboard, their remaining deck becomes their starting deck. See rule 103.2a.
glossary.zh: 在牌手将其备牌放在一边之后，其余的套牌便成为其起始套牌。参见规则103.2a。

glossary.en: The number of cards a player draws as a game begins. In most games, each player’s starting hand size is seven. See rule 103.5.
glossary.zh: 牌手在游戏开始时抓牌的数量。在大多数游戏中，每位牌手的起手牌数量为七。参见规则103.5。

glossary.en: The amount of life a player has as a game begins. In most games, each player’s starting life total is 20. See rule 103.4.
glossary.zh: 牌手在游戏开始时的生命总值。在大多数游戏中，每位牌手的起始总生命为20。参见规则103.4。

glossary.en: The player chosen to take the first turn of a game. See rule 103.1.
glossary.zh: 选择进行游戏第一个回合的牌手。参见规则103.1。

glossary.en: The team chosen to take the first turn of a game using the shared team turns option. See rule 103.1.
glossary.zh: 在使用队伍共享回合模式中，选择进行游戏第一个回合的队伍。参见规则103.1。

glossary.en: Game actions that happen automatically whenever certain conditions are met. See rule 704, “State-Based Actions.”
glossary.zh: 每当特定条件符合时自动发生的游戏动作。参见规则704，“状态动作”。

glossary.en: A triggered ability that triggers when a game state is true rather than triggering when an event occurs. See rule 603.8.
glossary.zh: 一个当游戏状态符合而不是触发事件发生时触发的触发式异能。参见规则603.8。

glossary.en: A kind of ability. Static abilities do something all the time rather than being activated or triggered. See rule 113, “Abilities,” and rule 604, “Handling Static Abilities.”
glossary.zh: 一种异能。静止式异能时刻都生效而不是被起动或触发。参见规则113，“异能”，以及规则604，“处理静止式异能”。

glossary.en: The physical state of a permanent. See rule 110.5.
glossary.zh: 一个永久物的物理状态。参见规则110.5。

glossary.en: A subsection of a phase. See section 5, “Turn Structure.”
glossary.zh: 一个阶段的一部分。参见第5章，“回合结构”。

glossary.en: A marker placed on an object that modifies its characteristics or interacts with a rule or effect. See rule 123, “Stickers.”
glossary.zh: 一个置于物件或牌手上的标示物，影响其特征或与规则或效应互动。参见规则123，“贴纸”。

glossary.en: A kicker variant that can add a sticker to the spell with the ability and give a player a ticket counter. See rule 702.33h.
glossary.zh: 增幅异能的一种变化，可以在咒语上贴上贴纸并给予牌手门票指示物。参见规则702.33h。

glossary.en: The collection of stickers found on an insert in Unfinity booster packs. See rule 123, “Stickers.”
glossary.zh: 贴纸的集合，能够在Unfinity系列补充包的贴纸页上找到。参见规则123，“贴纸”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that creates copies of a spell. See rule 702.40, “Storm.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，创造咒语的复制。参见规则702.40，“风暴”。

glossary.en: A counter that stops a permanent from untapping. See rule 122.1d.
glossary.zh: 一种指示物，阻止永久物重置。参见规则122.1d。

glossary.en: A completely separate Magic game created by an effect. See rule 726, “Subgames.”
glossary.zh: 由一个效应创造出的完全分开的万智牌游戏。参见规则726，“子游戏”。

glossary.en: A game supplement with a Magic card back that can be used to represent a double-faced card or meld card. See rule 713, “Substitute Cards.”
glossary.zh: 一种游戏辅助用品，具有万智牌牌背，可用于代表一张双面牌或融合牌。参见规则713，“辅助牌”。

glossary.en: A characteristic that appears after the card type and a long dash on a card’s type line. See rule 205.3, “Subtypes.”
glossary.zh: 一个特征，在类别栏中牌类别和长横线（中文版使用“～”）后面。参见规则205.3，“副类别”。

glossary.en: A term that was printed on some older cards. In general, cards that referred to a spell being “successfully cast” have received errata in the Oracle card reference to simply refer to a spell being “cast.”
glossary.zh: 一些老牌上印的用词。一般情况下指咒语被“成功施放”的牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已得到勘误，改为该咒语被“施放”。

glossary.en: Older creature cards were printed with “Summon [creature type]” on their type lines. All such cards have received errata in the Oracle card reference to say “Creature — [creature type].” (Many of these cards’ creature types have also been updated.) See Creature.
glossary.zh: 老生物牌的类别栏上印有“召唤[生物类别]”。这些牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已得到勘误，改为“生物～[生物类别]”。（这其中很多牌的生物类别也已经更新。）另参见生物。

glossary.en: Informal term for a player’s inability to attack with a creature or to activate its abilities that include the tap symbol or the untap symbol unless the creature has been under that player’s control since the beginning of that player’s most recent turn. See rule 302.6. See also Haste.
glossary.zh: 非正式用语，指除非一个生物在牌手最近的一个回合开始时便已经操控它，否则该牌手不能用该生物进行攻击或起动它包含横置符号或重置符号的起动式异能。参见规则302.6。另参见敏捷。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that can have a permanent enter the battlefield with +1/+1 counters or charge counters on it. See rule 702.44, “Sunburst.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让永久物进入战场时具有+1/+1指示物或充电指示物。参见规则702.44，“辉映”。

glossary.en: A characteristic that appears before the card type on a card’s type line. Most cards don’t have a supertype. See rule 205.4, “Supertypes.”
glossary.zh: 一个特征，出现在牌类别栏的牌类别之前。大多数牌没有超类别。参见规则205.4，“超类别”。

glossary.en: A Free-for-All game in which each player is an archenemy. See rule 806, “Free-for-All,” and rule 904, “Archenemy.”
glossary.zh: 每位牌手都是魔王的自由竞赛游戏。参见规则806，“自由竞赛模式”和规则904，“魔王”。

glossary.en: A keyword action that lets you put +1/+1 counters on creatures. See rule 701.35, “Support.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，让你在生物上放置+1/+1指示物。参见规则701.35，“支援”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that provides an alternative cost to cast a card if you or one of your teammates has cast another spell in the same turn. See rule 702.117, “Surge.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，提供一种施放牌的替代性费用，可以在你或队友在同一回合中施放过其他咒语后使用。参见规则702.117，“潮涌”。

glossary.en: To manipulate some of the cards on top of your library, sending some of them to your graveyard and rearranging the rest. See rule 701.42, “Surveil.”
glossary.zh: 操纵你牌库顶的一些牌，将其中一些牌放进你的坟墓场，并重新排列剩余的牌。参见规则701.42，“刺探”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that provides an alternative way to play a card. See rule 702.62, “Suspend.” A card is “suspended” if it’s in the exile zone, has suspend, and has a time counter on it.
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，提供使用一张牌的其他途径。参见规则702.62，“延缓”。如果一张牌在放逐区、具有延缓、并且具有计时指示物，则该牌“已延缓”。

glossary.en: One of the five basic land types. Any land with this subtype has the ability “{T}: Add {B}.” See rule 305.6.
glossary.zh: 五种基本地类别中的一种。任何具有此副类别的地都具有异能“{T}：加{B}。”参见规则305.6。

glossary.en: See Typecycling.
glossary.zh: 参见类别循环。

glossary.en: See Landwalk.
glossary.zh: 参见地行者。

glossary.en: To turn a permanent sideways from an upright position. See rule 701.21, “Tap and Untap.”
glossary.zh: 将一个永久物从正常位置转到横向位置。参见规则701.21，“横置和重置”。

glossary.en: A status a permanent may have. See rule 110.5 and rule 701.21, “Tap and Untap.” See also Untapped.
glossary.zh: 一个永久物可能具有的状态。参见规则110.5和规则701.21，“横置和重置”。另参见未横置。

glossary.en: The tap symbol {T} in an activation cost means “Tap this permanent.” See rule 107.5.
glossary.zh: 在起动费用中的横置符号{T}指“横置此永久物”。参见规则107.5。

glossary.en: A preselected object or player a spell or ability will affect. See rule 115, “Targets.”
glossary.zh: 事先对一个咒语或异能将影响的物件或牌手作出的选择。参见规则115，“目标”。

glossary.en: A group of players who share a common victory condition in a multiplayer game. See rule 808, “Team vs. Team Variant,” rule 809, “Emperor Variant,” rule 810, “Two-Headed Giant Variant,” and rule 811, “Alternating Teams Variant.”
glossary.zh: 在多人游戏中共享相同胜利条件的一组牌手。参见规则808，“队伍对队伍玩法”、规则809，“皇帝玩法”、规则810，“双头巨人玩法”、和规则811，“隔位分队玩法”。

glossary.en: In a multiplayer game between teams, a player’s teammates are the other players on their team. See rule 102.3.
glossary.zh: 在队伍间的多人游戏中，牌手的队友是其队伍中的其他牌手。参见规则102.3。

glossary.en: A multiplayer variant played among two or more teams, each of which sits together. See rule 808, “Team vs. Team Variant.”
glossary.zh: 两个或以上队伍间的多人玩法，每个队伍坐在一起。参见规则808，“队伍对队伍玩法”。

glossary.en: Part of a card. The text box is printed on the lower half of the card and contains the card’s rules text, reminder text, and flavor text. See rule 207, “Text Box.”
glossary.zh: 牌的一部分。文字栏印在牌的下面一半，包括该牌的规则叙述、提示文字、和背景叙述。参见规则207，“文字栏”。

glossary.en: A continuous effect that changes the text that appears in an object’s text box and/or type line. See rule 612, “Text-Changing Effects.”
glossary.zh: 改变物件文字栏内和/或类别栏内文字叙述的持续性效应。参见规则612，“改变叙述的效应”。

glossary.en: “Threshold” used to be a keyword ability. It is now an ability word and has no rules meaning. All cards printed with the threshold keyword have received errata in the Oracle card reference.
glossary.zh: “门槛”曾经是关键字异能。现在是异能提示且没有规则意义。所有印有门槛的牌都在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误。

glossary.en: The ticket symbol {TK} with no numbers in it represents one ticket counter. The ticket symbol with a number in it represents a ticket cost. To pay a ticket cost, a player removes that many ticket counters from themselves.
glossary.zh: 内部没有数字的门票符号{TK}代表一个门票指示物。内部有数字的门票符号代表门票费用。要支付门票费用，牌手从其自身移除相应数量的门票指示物。

glossary.en: To add a time counter to or remove a time counter from any number of permanents you control with a time counter on them or suspended cards you own in exile with time counters on them. See rule 701.54, “Time Travel.”
glossary.zh: 从任意数量由你操控且其上有计时指示物的永久物和/或放逐区内由你拥有且其上有计时指示物之已延缓的牌上放置或移去一个计时指示物。参见规则701.54，“时间旅行”。

glossary.en: A system used to determine in which order continuous effects in the same layer or sublayer are applied. See rule 613.7. See also Dependency.
glossary.zh: 用来决定同一层或副层中持续性效应生效顺序的系统。参见规则613.7。另参见从属关系。

glossary.en: A marker used to represent any permanent that isn’t represented by a card. See rule 111, “Tokens.”
glossary.zh: 一个标记，用来表示任何不用牌来表示的永久物。参见规则111，“衍生物”。

glossary.en: An icon that appears in the upper left of some Odyssey block cards that has no effect on game play. See rule 107.9.
glossary.zh: 在一些奥德赛环境牌的左上角有墓碑符号，它对游戏没有影响。参见规则107.9。

glossary.en: An obsolete term for mana value. Cards printed with this term have received errata in the Oracle card reference.
glossary.zh: 法术力值的已废止用词。印有此叙述的牌已经在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误。

glossary.en: What a player actually has to pay, in practical terms, to cast a spell or activated ability: the mana cost, activation cost, or alternative cost, plus all cost increases (including additional costs) and minus all cost reductions. See rule 601.2f.
glossary.zh: 牌手实际需要为施放咒语或起动异能所支付的费用；法术力费用、起动费用、或替代性费用，加上所有增加的费用（包括额外费用）并减去所有减少的费用。参见规则601.2f。

glossary.en: An obsolete keyword ability that has been renamed. See rule 702.89, “Umbra Armor.”
glossary.zh: 一个已废止的关键字异能，已被重新命名。参见规则702.89，“本影甲”。

glossary.en:
1. Part of a card that only creature cards have. A creature card’s toughness is printed after the slash in its lower right corner. See rule 208, “Power/Toughness.”
2. A characteristic that only creatures have. See rule 302.4.
glossary.zh:
1. 只有生物牌具有的牌的一部分。生物牌的防御力印在其右下角斜线之后。参见规则208，“力量/防御力”。
2. 一个只有生物才具有的特征。参见规则302.4。

glossary.en: An organized play activity where players compete against other players. See rule 100.6.
glossary.zh: 一个牌手与其他牌手竞技的组织化赛事活动。参见规则100.6。

glossary.en: Additional rules that apply to games played in a sanctioned tournament. See rule 100.6.
glossary.zh: 对认证比赛生效的额外规则。参见规则100.6。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that causes a player to get poison counters due to combat damage from creatures with the ability. See rule 702.164, “Toxic.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，使牌手因具有此异能的生物造成的战斗伤害获得中毒指示物。参见规则702.164，“下毒”。

glossary.en: A Magic card that measures approximately 2.5 inches (6.3 centimeters) by 3.5 inches (8.8 centimeters) and is included in players’ decks. See rule 108.2.
glossary.zh: 传统的万智牌大约2.5英寸（6.3厘米）宽3.5英寸（8.8厘米）长，它们用于牌手的套牌中。参见规则108.2。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that means “Whenever this creature and at least one other creature with power greater that this creature’s power attack, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.” See rule 702.149, “Training.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，意指“每当此生物与至少一个力量较之为大的其他生物一起攻击时，在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。”参见规则702.149，“见习”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that modifies how a creature assigns combat damage. See rule 702.19, “Trample.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，影响生物如何分配战斗伤害。参见规则702.19，“践踏”。

glossary.en: A variant of trample that modifies how a creature assigns combat damage if it’s attacking a planeswalker. See rule 702.19, “Trample”
glossary.zh: 践踏异能的一种变化，影响生物在攻击鹏洛客时分配战斗伤害的方式。参见规则702.19，“践踏”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player search their library for a replacement creature card. See rule 702.71, “Transfigure.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手可以从其牌库中搜寻一张代替的生物牌。参见规则702.71，“易形”。

glossary.en: To turn a double-faced card so its other face is up. See rule 701.28, “Transform.”
glossary.zh: 将一张双面牌翻转从而让其另一面朝上。参见规则701.28，“转化”。

glossary.en: One of two kinds of double-faced cards. Transforming double-faced cards default to their front faces but can transform to their back faces in some way. See rule 712, “Double-Faced Cards.”
glossary.zh: 两种双面牌中的一种。转化式双面牌的默认使用其正面，但能以某种方式转化到其背面。参见规则712，“双面牌”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player search their library for a replacement card. See rule 702.53, “Transmute.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手从其牌库中搜寻一张代替的牌。参见规则702.53，“易质”。

glossary.en: A Treasure token is a colorless artifact token with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.” For more information about predefined tokens, see rule 111.10.
glossary.zh: 珍宝衍生物是具有“{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力。”的无色衍生神器。欲知关于预定义衍生物的更多信息，参见规则111.10。

glossary.en: An obsolete card type that has been renamed. See rule 308, “Kindreds.”
glossary.zh: 一个已废止的牌类别，已被重新命名。参见规则308，“亲缘”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows an opponent to choose between a creature entering the battlefield with +1/+1 counters or an additional ability. See rule 702.104, “Tribute.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许对手选择让生物进战场时具有+1/+1指示物或一个额外异能。参见规则702.104，“致敬”。

glossary.en: Whenever a game event or game state matches a triggered ability’s trigger event, that ability automatically “triggers.” That means its controller puts it on the stack the next time a player would receive priority. See rule 603, “Handling Triggered Abilities.”
glossary.zh: 每当游戏事件或游戏状态符合一个触发式异能的触发事件时，该异能自动“触发”。这表示其操控者在下一词有牌手将得到优先权时将它放进堆叠。参见规则603，“处理触发式异能”。

glossary.en: The first part of a triggered ability, consisting of “when,” “whenever,” or “at” followed by a trigger event. See rule 603, “Handling Triggered Abilities.”
glossary.zh: 触发式异能的第一部分，包含“当”、“每当”、或“在”以及之后的触发事件。参见规则603，“处理触发式异能”。

glossary.en: A kind of ability. Triggered abilities begin with the word “when,” “whenever,” or “at.” They’re written as “[Trigger condition], [effect].” See rule 113, “Abilities,” and rule 603, “Handling Triggered Abilities.”
glossary.zh: 一种异能。触发式异能以词语“当”、“每当”、或“在”开头。它们的格式为“[触发条件]，[效应]”。参见规则113，“异能”、以及规则603，“处理触发式异能”。

glossary.en: The event that a triggered ability looks for. Whenever the trigger event occurs, the triggered ability triggers. See rule 603, “Handling Triggered Abilities.”
glossary.zh: 触发式异能所注意的事件。每当触发事件发生时，该触发式异能触发。参见规则603，“处理触发式异能”。

glossary.en: Game actions that happen automatically when certain steps or phases begin, or when each step or phase ends. See rule 703, “Turn-Based Actions.”
glossary.zh: 当特定的步骤或阶段开始时或当每个步骤或阶段结束时，自动发生的游戏动作。参见规则703，“回合动作”。

glossary.en: Markers used to keep track of which players are taking turns in a Grand Melee game. See rule 807.4.
glossary.zh: 大型混战游戏中，用于记录正在进行其回合之牌手的标记物。参见规则807.4。

glossary.en: A multiplayer variant played among two-player teams that each have a shared life total and take a simultaneous turn. See rule 810, “Two-Headed Giant Variant.”
glossary.zh: 一个多人玩法，在两人共享总生命且同时进行回合的队伍之间展开。参见规则801，“双头巨人玩法”。

glossary.en:
1. An object’s card type or, more broadly, its card type, subtype, and/or supertype. See rule 205, “Type Line,” and section 3, “Card Types.”
2. An attribute mana has. See rule 106, “Mana.”
glossary.zh:
1. 一个物件的牌类别，或更笼统的，它的牌类别、超类别、和/或副类别。参见规则205，“类别栏”、以及第3章，“牌类别”。
2. 一个法术力的属性。参见规则106，“法术力”。

glossary.en: An icon that appears in the upper left of some Future Sight cards that has no effect on game play. See rule 107.10.
glossary.zh: 在一些预知将来版本的卡牌左上角有类别符号，它们对游戏没有影响。参见规则107.10。

glossary.en: Part of a card. The type line is printed directly below the illustration and contains the card’s card type(s), subtype(s), and/or supertype(s). See rule 205, “Type Line.”
glossary.zh: 牌的一部分。类别栏印在图片的下方，包括该牌的牌类别、副类别、和/或超类别。参见规则205，“类别栏”。

glossary.en: An effect that changes an object’s card type, subtype, and/or supertype. See rules 205.1a–b, 305.7, and 613.1d.
glossary.zh: 一个改变物件的牌类别、副类别、和/或超类别的效应。参见规则205.1a-b、305.7、以及613.1d。

glossary.en: A variant of the cycling ability. See rule 702.29, “Cycling.”
glossary.zh: 一种循环异能。参见规则702.29，“循环”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows an Aura to protect the permanent it’s enchanting. See rule 702.89, “Umbra Armor.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，允许灵气保护其所结附的永久物。参见规则702.89，“本影甲”。

glossary.en: To move an Equipment away from the creature it’s attached to so that the Equipment is on the battlefield but is not equipping anything. See rule 701.3d.
glossary.zh: 将一个武具从其所贴附的生物上移走，从而让武具留在战场上但不装备在任何生物上。参见规则701.3d。

glossary.en: A term that meant “can’t be blocked.” Cards that used this term have received errata in the Oracle card reference.
glossary.zh: 一个曾经表示“不可被阻挡”的用词。印有此叙述的牌已经在Oracle牌张参考文献中得到了勘误。

glossary.en: An attacking creature once no creature has been declared as a blocker for it, unless an effect has caused it to become blocked. It remains an unblocked creature until it’s removed from combat or the combat phase ends, whichever comes first. See rule 509, “Declare Blockers Step.”
glossary.zh: 一旦一个攻击生物没有被宣告任何阻挡者，除非一个效应导致它被阻挡。它在从战斗中被移除或战斗阶段结束两者中先发生的情况未知，一直保持是未被阻挡的生物。参见规则509，“宣告阻挡者步骤”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that reduces the cost of a spell based on the number of opponents you have. See rule 702.125, “Undaunted.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，根据你的对手数量减少一个咒语的费用。参见规则702.125，“不屈”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that can return a creature from the graveyard to the battlefield. See rule 702.93, “Undying.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，将生物从坟墓场中移回战场上。参见规则702.93，“不息”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a player return a creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield. See rule 702.84, “Unearth.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让牌手将生物牌从坟墓场中移回战场上。参见规则702.84，“破坟”。

glossary.en: A default status a permanent may have. See rule 110.5 and rule 710, “Flip Cards.” See also Flipped.
glossary.zh: 一个永久物可能具有的默认状态。参见规则110.5和规则710，“倒转牌”。另参见倒转。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that allows a creature to enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and stops it from blocking if it has a +1/+1 counter on it. See rule 702.98, “Unleash.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物进入战场时具有+1/+1指示物，并且如果它具有+1/+1指示物则防止其阻挡。参见规则702.98，“脱缰”。

glossary.en: A word used to indicate a certain style of cost. See rule 118.12a.
glossary.zh: 一个词，用来确定特殊样式的费用。参见规则118.12a。

glossary.en: To rotate a permanent back to the upright position from a sideways position. See rule 701.21, “Tap and Untap.”
glossary.zh: 将永久物从横向位置转回到正常位置。参见规则701.21，“横置和重置”。

glossary.en: Part of the turn. This step is the first step of the beginning phase. See rule 502, “Untap Step.”
glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。该步骤是开始阶段的第一个步骤。参见规则502，“重置步骤”。

glossary.en: The untap symbol {Q} in an activation cost means “Untap this permanent.” See rule 107.6.
glossary.zh: 在起动费用中的重置符号{Q}指“重置此永久物”。参见规则107.6。

glossary.en: A default status a permanent may have. See rule 110.5 and rule 701.21, “Tap and Untap.” See also Tapped.
glossary.zh: 一个永久物可能具有的默认状态。参见规则110.5和规则701.21，“横置和重置”。另参见已横置。

glossary.en: Part of the turn. This step is the second step of the beginning phase. See rule 503, “Upkeep Step.”
glossary.zh: 回合的一部分。该步骤是开始阶段的第二个步骤。参见规则503，“维持步骤”。

glossary.en: Informal term for a previous system of taking a mulligan. Using the Vancouver mulligan, a player who took a mulligan shuffled their hand into their library and drew one fewer card. After choosing to not mulligan, a player who took a mulligan looked at the top card of their library and could put it on the bottom of their library. For current mulligan rules, see rule 103.5.
glossary.zh: 指代一种曾经的再调度方式的非正式用词。使用温哥华再调度方式时，牌手再调度时将其手牌洗入其牌库，然后少抓一张牌。在决定不再次再调度之后，已执行过再调度的牌手查看其牌库顶牌，并能够选择将其置于牌库底。要查看当前的再调度规则，参见规则103.5。

glossary.en:
1. A casual variant in which each player plays the role of a famous character. See rule 902, “Vanguard.”
2. A card type seen only on nontraditional Magic cards in the Vanguard casual variant. A vanguard card is not a permanent. See rule 313, “Vanguards.”
glossary.zh:
1. 一种休闲式玩法，牌手可以扮演一位著名的角色。参见规则902，“先锋”。
2. 一种牌类别，只在先锋休闲式玩法中使用的非传统万智牌上出现。先锋牌不是永久物。参见规则313，“先锋”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that limits how long a permanent remains on the battlefield. See rule 702.63, “Vanishing.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，限制一个永久物在战场上的时间。参见规则702.63，“消逝”。

glossary.en: An additional set of rules that determines the style of a multiplayer game. See rule 800.2.
glossary.zh: 决定一盘多人游戏风格的一组规则集合。参见规则800.2。

glossary.en: An artifact subtype. Vehicles can become artifact creatures. See rule 301, “Artifacts,” and rule 702.122, “Crew.”
glossary.zh: 一个神器副类别。载具可以变成神器生物。参见规则301，“神器”，以及规则702.122，“搭载”。

glossary.en: A variant of the venture into the dungeon ability that allows a player to bring a dungeon card with [quality] into the game or move a player’s venture marker. See rule 701.46, “Venture into the Dungeon.”
glossary.zh: 深入地城异能的一种变化形式，使牌手将具[特性]的地城牌带入游戏，或移动牌手的进度标记。参见规则701.46，“深入地城”。

glossary.en: A keyword action that can bring dungeon cards into the game from outside the game or move a player’s venture marker. See rule 701.46, “Venture into the Dungeon.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字动作，可以将地城牌从游戏外带入游戏，或移动牌手的进度标记。参见规则701.46，“深入地城”。

glossary.en: A marker used to track which room of a dungeon card a player is currently in. See rule 309, “Dungeons.”
glossary.zh: 一种标记，用来记录牌手当前在地城牌的哪个房间中。参见规则309，“地城”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that lets a creature attack without tapping. See rule 702.20, “Vigilance.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，让生物进行攻击不需横置。参见规则702.20，“警戒”。

glossary.en: A keyword ability found on Attraction cards. It provides an effect whenever you roll to visit your attractions and get certain results. See rule 702.159, “Visit.”
glossary.zh: 一个见于景点牌上的关键字异能。它在你掷骰造访景点并获得特定结果时提供效应。参见规则702.159，“造访”。

glossary.en: Some cards instruct players to vote from among given options. See rule 701.32, “Vote.”
glossary.zh: 一些牌会指示牌手对给定的选项进行投票。参见规则701.32，“投票”。

glossary.en: A Walker token is a 2/2 black Zombie creature token named Walker. For more information on predefined tokens, see rule 111.10.
glossary.zh: 尸行者衍生物是名为尸行者的2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。欲知关于预定义衍生物的更多信息，参见规则111.10。

glossary.en: A creature type with no particular rules meaning. Older cards with the Wall creature type but without defender had an unwritten ability that precluded them from attacking. Those cards have received errata in the Oracle card reference to have defender. Some older cards that referenced the Wall creature type have also received errata. See Defender.
glossary.zh: 一个生物类别，不具有特别的规则意义。旧系列具有墙生物类别但没有守军的牌具有未写明的异能，阻止它们进行攻击。这些牌在Oracle牌张参考文献中已经得到勘误具有守军。一些旧系列的牌有提及墙生物类别也得到了勘误。参见守军。

glossary.en: A triggered ability that can counter spells or abilities that target the permanent with ward. See rule 702.21, “Ward.”
glossary.zh: 一个触发式异能，可以反击指定具守护异能之永久物的咒语或异能。参见规则702.21，“守护”。

glossary.en: There are several ways to win the game. See rule 104, “Ending the Game,” and rules 810.8 (for additional rules for Two-Headed Giant games) and rule 809.5 (for additional rules for Emperor games).
glossary.zh: 有多种方法可以取得游戏的胜利。参见规则104，“结束游戏”，以及规则810.8（双头巨人游戏的额外规则）和规则809.5（皇帝玩法的额外规则）。

glossary.en: A keyword ability that affects how an object deals damage to a creature. See rule 702.80, “Wither.”
glossary.zh: 一个关键字异能，影响物件如何对生物造成伤害。参见规则702.80，“干枯”。

glossary.en: See Typecycling.
glossary.zh: 参见类别循环。

glossary.en: A supertype that’s normally relevant on enchantments. See rule 205.4, “Supertypes.” See also World Rule.
glossary.zh: 一个超类别，一般情况下与结界有关。参见规则205.4，“超类别”。另参见普世规则。

glossary.en: A state-based action that causes all permanents with the world supertype except the one that has had the world supertype for the shortest amount of time are put into their owners’ graveyards. See rule 704.5k.
glossary.zh: 一个状态动作，让所有具有普世超类别的永久物，除了拥有普世超类别时间最短的一个以外，皆置入其拥有者的坟墓场。参见规则704.5k。

glossary.en: A placeholder for a number that needs to be determined. See rule 107.3.
glossary.zh: 一个需要被确定数字的占位符。参见规则107.3。

glossary.en: See X.
glossary.zh: 参见X。

glossary.en: Words that refer to an object’s controller, its would-be controller (if a player is attempting to cast or activate it), or its owner (if it has no controller). See rule 109.5.
glossary.zh: 指一个物件的操控者、它即将的操控者（如果牌手正准备施放或起动它），或它的拥有者（如果没有操控者）。参见规则109.5。

glossary.en: A place where objects can be during a game. See section 4, “Zones.”
glossary.zh: 在游戏过程中物件所处于的位置。参见第4章，“区域”。

glossary.en: Trigger events that involve objects changing zones. See rule 603.6.
glossary.zh: 与物件改变区域相关的触发事件。参见规则603.6。
